“Whoa, what’s going on?” That kid like voice can be heard, as who was it that came and surprised to see Frenchfry in their suite?

Now that there was no one to stop him, Frenchfry looks over to see who gets the fattening treatment, even when he uses the cooker to start making lots of food. He’ll be hoping someone would come over from that smell and try his stuff.

It wouldn’t take that long for his to come, as the creature was approached by one of the quadruplets, who is ten years of age, and looks so confused by Frenchfry’s appearance and why he’s using the kitchen. One of the kids is who?

Experiment 062 simply responded with a grin and a nod, as he continued to cook up lots of meals. Nicky was gonna call over his other siblings, when he got destructed by Frenchfry, giving him.... what else? French Fries!

“Mmm... It’s so delicious! I think you’re the better cook than my Mom.” Nicky says in a statement, which made Frenchfry delighted with a grinned satisfactory look to his face.

He wouldn’t want to just stand there and watch a 10 year old boy eat, so he would continue cooking and passed it over to Nicky to have some more. Of course with it being so good, Nicky wouldn’t want to turn down this professional chef, and have another batch of French Fries to fill himself up.

1142242111.content:
Frenchfry was watching boringly the television in Lilo’s house.

Since she and Nani had converted him to a more ‘Healthy’ lifestyle, everything seemed boring in his eyes. That was until on the channel arrived an episode of Brooklyn 99. This was something that always lifted his spirits, but this time, as he watched the show and the character of Amy Santiago, a new idea came to his mind. An idea that could grant him a lot of fun without really harming anyone.

Standing from the couch on which he was seated he moved closer to the television and, with a twirl of his tail he seemed to merge inside the television, vanishing from the room.

---------

Amy Santiago was sitting at her desk, typing away at her latest report. The sergeant was compiling everything to perfection, she knew that the Captain was going to read it and she needed for it to be perfect. Just as she was going to fill the next section a colleague knocked on her desk lightly, informing her that Captain Holt wanted to see her.

Standing at attention, Amy quickly, but without running, walked down the corridor and soon was in the office of Captain Ray Holt.

“Captain? Wanted to see me?”

“Santiago. Yes, that’s why I called for you. Sit down, please.”

As the girl sat, Ray Holt did the same and began turning some pages out of a report he had on his desk, until he finally turned his stare on Amy.

“So, Santiago… From what I can see in this report, the last time you’ve had your rest was a few years ago…why’s that?”

“Sir…” she began “There is always so much to do that I wouldn’t feel comfortable in leaving the station without…”

Before she could finish, the captain interrupted her with a gesture of his hand.

“What make me uncomfortable, Santiago, is the higher ups breathing down on my neck with the accusation that I don’t grant YOU any vacation time. Due to this, whether you like it or not, from tomorrow you’ll be in a month-long R&R.

And just to make sure you’ll stick to it I’ll send someone to keep an eye on you.
But, since as you said, there is always an emergency that may come I ask you to remain inside NY for the time of this Rest & Recreation.
Did I make myself clear, Sergeant?”

“Sir, Yessir! I…I’ll do as you say, Sir.”

“Good, you may go now, Santiago.”

As Amy went out of the Captain’s office she breathed in relief. It wasn’t going to be easy to just lay off work like that but, she had received worst orders in the past.


The following morning Amy woke up quite late, remembering that she was on a forced vacation, and went to the kitchen to fix herself some breakfast. She was already dressed to go out, with her long trousers and a black blouse but as soon as she reached the kitchen she heard someone at the door. Curious she went to see and opening the door she saw this strange little creature, with a spatula shaped tail and a white chef hat on his head.

“Erm…Who…What are you?”

Frenchfry couldn’t speak, he knew almost nothing of human language but, that wasn’t going to be a problem for he had come prepared. As soon as he had entered the TV show he had managed to sneak inside the police station and quickly had forged some documents making his presence near Santiago as Official as he could. Swiftly he twirled on the spot and produced a printed sheet of papers offering it to the girl.

Amy took the papers from the strange little being and quickly scanned the content, always keeping the beast under her eyes.

‘Yada yada yada…Name’s Frenchfry….Personal chef….Nationality: French…Assigned from request of Capt. Holt and Human Resources to Sergeant Santiago to keep track and assist her during the allotted R&R time. He will be sending reports to the unit and will be in charge of deciding if the R&R has to be extended!? ’

As she read the last part she almost choke by herself, while the little guy kept standing there smiling at her.

“So you will be following me for this month, uh? Well, if the Captain has chosen you for this I guess It’s fine. So, I was just preparing some breakfast, do you wanna come in…Frenchfry?”

Experiment 062 smiled revealing his sparkling white teeth and soon followed Amy inside but, as soon as she closed the door she heard the sound of a small hurricane and when she turned to look she stood speechless as she saw that her kitchen table was now covered by a tablecloth and food was already there waiting for her. Standing by the chair there was the little chef who, smiling, motioned to her to sit down.
“Bon Appetite! ”

Amy sat and looked at what the little guy had prepared for her in less than a few seconds, staring at it in disbelief. Right in front of her there was a steaming cup of hot coffee, a plate with two white and peppered eggs, some bacon strips and even a small-ish bowl of cereal.

“You really have made all this for me, Frenchfry?”

The experiment simply nodded, while motioning to her to eat.

“Well, then. It’s a bit more than I’m used to but that’s what vacations are for, isn’t it?”

As Amy took the first sip from the coffee, she felt herself being elevated to a new plane of existence. Without noticing she began attacking the meal as if she was starving, cleaning it out in less than a few minutes. Everything was delicious, it was so good to be almost perfect and yet, even as everything was cleared out, she still felt her belly rumbling. As she cleaned her lips with a napkin she looked transfixed as Frenchfry twirled once more and left on the table, under her own eyes, a second breakfast, slightly bigger than the first one.
“Are you sure I should..?”

“Bon Appetite.”

Amy looked at the second breakfast laid out in front of her, this time there was a plate with an omelette worth of three eggs, with a side of several fried bacon strips. Right beside that, there was another plate with some fired sausages, with a side of fries and fried cheese bites. Between the two plates, two tall glasses of what seemed to be chocolate milkshake. Without wasting time she launched herself at her second breakfast, eating everything with gusto, without noticing the impact that those meals were having on her figure.
As she kept stuffing food in her mouth, so her body began to grow larger. It was a slow process and, as she finished her second breakfast, it barely was noticeable but Experiment 062 was watching her like a hawk, smiling as he envisioned her in a week time of constant meals.

Amy was now slumped against her chair, she wasn’t feeling anymore that deep hunger, but she also wasn’t feeling quite full. She idly wondered if she wanted to ask for more or if it was better to rest a bit on the couch while watching some TV. Every thought of going out had completely gone from her mind. Still, before she could decide, Frenchfry decided it for her as he….
1142242111.title: A new dawn for Amy Santiago

choices: One hour of feeding and then rest till lunch time
Why stop? Let her eat all day long!
Suddenly her trouser button pops! Will she awake from her trance?
11422421111.content:
Amy swiftly followed the little chef and moved from the kitchen toward the couch where she sat groaning blissfully. As she idly began watching the TV, she noticed that on the armrest of the couch there was a bowl full of small chocolates, while on the other side a larger bowl filled with buttered popcorn.
Beside this last bowl a large two liters bottle of soda.

Without even noticing it she slowly, but with increasing pace, she began to scoop first some chocolates and then some popcorn from the two bowls. Amy was in paradise, she thought that if that was R&R then she had been wrong in not doing it sooner.

As the girl ate and rested, Experiment 062 wasn’t sitting idly. He twirled this way and that, as he cleaned the house and the kitchen and as he checked the house for the ingredients needed to perform his magic.

Every now and then, he moved beside the Sergeant and swiftly refilled both bowls, as their content was quickly being engulfed in the girl’s belly. And what a belly she was beginning to show. Even though it was still small and covered by the blouse, Frenchfry could see that it was beginning to grow rounder and more bloated with each morsel. Still, he could see that without his intervention, Amy would take way too much time to fatten herself up on her own.

With a smile and a twirl, he appeared beside her with a platter chocked full of hot dogs, as he offered them to her, while telling her in his own French accent his catchphrase.

“Bon Appetite!”

Amy was surprised in seeing the little chef appear beside her so suddenly but, the enticing aroma of the hot dogs he was giving her managed to relax her just as quickly.

“More? But haven’t I had breakfast not even ten minutes ago?
Still…those sure smells good. Alright, and could you bring me some mayonnaise?”

As she took the platter, and began stuffing the hot dogs in her mouth, she realized that Frenchfry was already at her side with a bottle of mayo.

“Thanksch!” she said as she swallowed a mouthful, blissfully unaware that the more she kept eating the more her belly began to bloat outwards.

“Mmmh…so…good…”

In the back of her mind she idly wondered why she was still eating but, with each new morsel, that thought drifted away only to be replaced with a desire for more. Frenchfry could see the bliss in the young woman eyes and smiled once more as he quickly prepared a new platter, this time full of burritos, and offered it to the girl which accepted it without a fuss.

And yet, Experiment 062 wondered for how long he could go on feeding her, considering he still wanted to prepare for her a big, filling, lunch…
11422421111.title: After Breakfast, time for a snack

choices: Frenchfry quickly offered her a massive chocolate cake, distracting her
also the blouse began to rip and tear
the sound of her chair creaking seemed a more immediate threat
She ignored it, just feeling good from the freed space in her belly
114224211111.content:
It was now almost 11 am, and Frenchfry decided that enough was enough.

Amy was still sprawled on the couch, but she had changed drastically. With an hour long of constant feeding her body fattened quite a bit, her trousers were pushing against her skin, tighter than ever. Her blouse did not fare too well either, as her belly pushed against it making that also, almost skintight.

The little chef watched with glee at how the girl had changed under his care and, as she began to sleep as no more food was being offered to her, he grinned and began to inspect first hand how the girl had changed. Eliciting a satisfied moan from Amy, Frenchfry began rubbing and playing a little with her belly, admiring his own handiwork while letting her rest until it was time for lunch.

A few hours later Amy woke up with a yawn. Groggily she looked around trying to understand why she was on the couch, when it returned to her that she was on R&R and that the small beast chef had been assigned to her.

Slowly she rose from the couch, feeling that something wasn’t fitting quite right but, as she began to assess her situation a heavenly smell reached her and all her thoughts turned on that. She moved quickly to the kitchen where she saw Frenchfry eagerly applying the final additions to the kitchen table.

Experiment 062, noticing the arrival of Amy quickly moved beside her and ushered her to the chair, placing then a napkin around her neck.

“Bon Appetite!”

Amy looked astounded at the spread on her table.
There were full plates of pasta, with a thick and heavy cheese sauce, then platters of burgers bigger than her own closed fists, then buckets of fried chicken and still more. She stared at all that for almost a minute before turning her head toward the chef.

“Seriously? Are you sure that I have to eat all of this? Whose bright idea was it? Was it Jake's?”

Frenchfry knew the show and so knew perfectly well who Jake was and so he bobbed his head to both side, as he moved one of his paws to indicate someone higher up in the rank ladder.

“It…It was the Captain?”

Here the little chef smiled and nodded, as he once more motioned her to eat.

“So, you’re saying me that the Captain instructed you to cook for me like this for the entire R&R?
Well, if it’s from Captain Holt How can I disagree? I’ll show him that I can endure this and much more!”

Frenchfry smiled impishly as Amy began scarfing down food like there was no tomorrow. He knew of her competitive streak and of her almost blind faith in her Captain. And mixing those two things with his addictive cooking he knew was the winning strategy for an ampler Amy.

The girl, meanwhile, was still eating like a woman possessed. Taking huge forkful of pasta, quickly followed by big bites of burger, but as she kept eating so her body began to grow rounder and fatter. Her blouse quickly began to lift, leaving her belly free of any restraint, as her pants began to grow tighter and tighter at each bite.
Her whole form was rounding out as more, and more fat piled onto her thin body and yet she kept eating, faster and faster, wanting to clear out the table of everything it had on.

Soon, she even stopped using utensils as it seemed to her that it was taking too long and she needed to have more. Everything tasted heavenly on her taste buds that she couldn’t stop herself. She quickly grabbed one of the few burgers remaining and began stuffing it into her mouth, almost choking on it, but with a blissful moan escaping from her throat.

‘How can he make this fast food taste so good? How could I resist it?’

She quickly gulped the last mouthful and began once more on the next one, still unaware of her widening figure. Frenchfry, instead, was admiring her growing larger and larger, as her entire being began to grow fatter, from her rounding belly to the softening of her facial features.

And how could he not see the bliss in her eyes as she craved, and gorged, on his food?

It was then, as she was cleaning out the last of the fried chicken breasts, that her trousers couldn’t contain her anymore as their button popped out flying in the air and landing with a surprisingly loud sound on the floor.

Amy frenzied look began to dissolve as the reality began to sink in but…
114224211111.title: One hour later….and Lunch!

choices: Two hours later, waking Amy for a post-lunch lunch
Straight to dinner! An all-nightlong dinner!
1142242111111.content:
Amy was sure to have heard something fall on the floor, something that had seemed to be very important to verify but, as she placed down the last piece of fried chicken on her grease covered platter, to use both arms to lift herself from the table, Frenchfry moved in front of her eyes a massive chocolate cake.

It was easily as big as a spare tire of a car, all covered in light chocolate and decorated with dark chocolate. It was so beautifully prepared, so magnificent in its form, so… so tasty to look at.

Amy’s mind tried valiantly to push away that sensory overload away and focus on the sound she had heard but the intoxicating presence of the cake was too much to resist. Experiment 062 simply cut an ample slice of the cake, easily a quart of it, and moved it forward, toward the growing girl.

“M-More? Gotta…gotta have more?”

“Bon appetite”

“Well….I.. I’m feeling quite full…but… But there’s always room for dessert, r-right?”

Amy was panting, both from exhaustion and from greed.

She felt tired, tired and full, but that dessert was so enticing, so captivating. Plus, she reasoned, if Captain Holt had ordered it how she could disobey?

And so, ignoring the plead of protest coming from her clothes she grabbed the slice and began devouring it, moaning in pleasure as the magnificent taste hit her full force. Frenchfry stood on the kitchen table motionless, watching as Amy Santiago devoured that first slice of cake and, as soon as she had closed her lips on her last mouthful, he quickly ushered a new slice on her plate.

The girl, unable to resist simply swallowed and brought the new slice to her lips, enjoying the rich taste of that dessert, but as she did so she seemed utterly ignorant of her own body adjustments toward that onslaught of calories.

A bite of the cake, and her trouser creaked once more, tight to the limit.

Another one, and the pants began to tear on the side of her tights, letting some caramel colored skin peek through the tear.

Yet another one, and also her blouse ripped open, letting her bloated gut surge outward.

And as more cake was being stuffed in her mouth, so her body grew fatter and rounder. As time passed, and with each quart safely stored in her belly, more and more her clothes began to rip down to shreds until she remained with only tattered remains of her dress. At that point, Amy, began to caress her full bloated gut, feeling its tautness under her touch. And yet, she was still too blissfully content to realize how big she had grown just in that fateful morning.

Not even the sound of the creaking chair on which she was seated was enough to wake her from that dreamily state. There was only one thing powerful enough to awaken her and Frenchfry knew what it was.

“Bon Appetite!”

Hearing those word, even though she felt full and content, Amy opened her eyes and stared open mouthed to the small chef as she left in front of her a vast tray full to the brim with donuts. Not your typical donuts either. As she craned her neck, which also had grown becoming easily a double chin, down to get a better look she realized those donuts were way bigger than the average ones.

As she slowly moved her arm to grab one, she stared dumbfounded at the treat that she could barely close her hand around. It was so large, and yet so soft to the touch.

Mouth watering, she slowly lifted her arm and brought that ‘Giga-donut’ to her mouth. As soon as she had given it her bite she began to slightly tremble from the pleasure of its taste. Not only it seemed to her way better than the cake but it was also filled with delicious crème!

Still, even though it was so good she found herself panting in tiredness, watching with sorrow as her fat laden arm began to lower that treat from her mouth against her wishes.

With a painful expression she turned toward the little chef which didn’t have need for words. Frenchfry simply smiled as the overinflated beachball sized girl looked at him pleadingly. He then grabbed a handful of those treats and began stuffing them, one by one, in Amy’s mouth until the entire tray was, once more, empty.

Amy gulped down each and any treat offered from the small chef, clearing out all those huge donuts and even a few more cakes he brought forward from who knows where.

As she began to fall asleep from the overstuffed feeling in her huge rounded gut, she began to think that maybe she truly had needed this month of vacation and that of having this little chef to cook her meals from now on was going to be the best decision she had ever had.

Frenchfry hummed softly a French tune as he cleaned out the kitchen and washed the dishes, and yet, from time to time, he turned to look at the engorged form of Amy Santiago, crumpled on her chair, sleeping like a log her gut wrenching meal.

Yes, he decided that he could compliment himself for a job well done.

At first he had been scared she would realize what was going on when that button popped, but now, after he had stuffed so much of his enhanced food into her, he was pretty confident that even if she truly saw her newer form, she would just make excuses instead of accepting the truth.

Still, that had been only the first morning, and he still had a month to let her grow bigger and fatter. He idly wondered if one month alone was going to be sufficient or, maybe, if he could convince her to stay away from her job for even more time.

But there was time to get there, after all…this meal had been only her first lunch under his tutelage, and there was still the afternoon meal and dinner to come, with all the snacking he could fit in between those.

Experiment 062 turned toward the, to his eye estimate, three hundred pounds whale asleep on her chair and smiled as he softly murmured between himself

“Bon Appetite”
1142242111111.title: Look! There’s Cake! And this Cake isn't a lie!

choices: The chairs begin to creak ominously under her immense weight and mass
Lunch time! Who's hungry for more?
11422421111114.content:
Amy stared silently to her own reflection in the mirror. It had been a week since Frenchfry had arrived into her house and she had quickly adapted to having him around. But something still didn’t seem right to her. As she turned this way and that, observing her reflection she tried hard to understand what was wrong but was unable to.

The truth behind this mystery was simpler than she could think.
She had gotten fat.
Hugely so.

Still, with so much enhanced food coursing into her body she wasn’t able to realize how big she had gotten in one simple week. She saw her reflection as she had always seen herself, but the reality was very different.
Her face had grown rounder and softer, her eyes had even began to squint a little from all the fat accumulated there. Right below her face a definite triple chin had grown and had begun to rise the hint of a fourth growing on her neck.
Her body overall was rounder than a demolition ball, her arms almost constantly on the side of her fattened and bloated torso, which was now so big not even two persons could embrace her all the way around it. Her funbags, bloated over any limit, and yet still perky, obscuring anything below her, except for her gut which still was very visible under them.
Her hips then, so wide flared that she had begun to, unconsciously, passing through door on the side to avoid getting stuck in the frame.
And then her legs, thick as barrels, forced her to a slow waddle at most.

But it wasn’t only the exterior that had changed in Amy during that week.

Her own behavior changed, her competitive streak moved mostly toward how much food she could eat and, most importantly, she had become more laid back and sluggish toward everything. As she observed herself she was wearing a tent like pair of sweat pants and sweat shirt, and still she felt them tight on her own body.

“Damn…the washer machine must be broken…could have sworn this wasn’t tight as it feels today.”

Her dress code was another huge change in her new lifestyle. Gone were the days of trouser and blouses, now comfort was the word. And so she had begun ordering online sweat pants and shorts, oversized t-shirts and so on. And during these purchases she seemed to ignore the fact that each clothes she bought had so many X’s in it that one could lose the count.

Huffing in anger she turned around and got out of her room only to be intercepted by her personal chef.

“Oh, Frenchfry? What is it?”

Experiment 062 didn’t say anything as he offered an entire shortcake to Amy, which she began eating with gusto, and then he tapped his finger on his wrist as if he had a watch on. The girl nodded in though, without stopping her consumption.

“Oh…I shee…*gulp*. It’s time for second breakfast?”

Frenchfry, enjoying how naïve this girl had becom under his guidance smiled and lifted three fingers.

“Oh! It’s third breakfast! Eh, since Captain Holt put me on this new diet I’m losing count of the time. Alright, let’s go then.”

As she waddled behind the small chef she distractedly looked at the clock in the corridor seeing that it was already 11 am. Chuckling a bit with herself she continued following her chef and personal trainer as she thought back to the parcel he had given her the second day he had been with her….

----

Amy is sitting at her kitchen table, idly munching on a donut the little creature had given her some time before, when she sees said chef coming toward her with a new platter of treats and a letter sealed with the stamp of her Captain.

Intrigued by the letter she opens it, as she stuff some more chocolaty treats in her mouth and she begin to read within herself.

‘Sergeant Santiago, I’m writing you this letter in case Frenchfry forgets to tell you directly.

As you may have seen the person we placed in charge of following you is not only a master chef capable of any treat conceivable but also a world renown expert of fitness training.
For this reason, and due to the results of your last physicals, I have decided to put him in charge of regulate your diet from day one till the end of the month. Should he feel the need to change your allotted amounts for the day, you will have to accept those changes.
One more thing, if, for any reasons, he should find you unable to retake service after this month of temporary rest, you are ordered to stand your ground and follow his advices as if they were my orders for any amount of time he may deem necessary.

Hoping in your success, once again.

Sincerely yours,
Captain Ray Holt’

Amy stares at the letter for a few minutes before turning toward the diminutive chef.

“So, basically, Holt is ordering me to follow whatever dietary regime you think is best for me right? Well, as good as you cooking is, I think nothing harmful could come out of it even if you fed me a truckload of it.
In any case…You lead…and I’ll follow.”

As she said that Frenchfry turned toward her and gave her a large burger the size of a watermelon.

“Bon Appetite!”

“Well” she said with a mouthful of the huge bun “I can guess you’re thinking of carbo-loading and weight lifting in my future”

------

Returning from those memories, Amy’s still waddling behind the tiny chef but she sees the kitchen where she passes most of her time nowadays. As ordered by her Captain she dutifully followed any and all meals offered to her by Frenchfry and soon enough got used to them, also due to the addictive nature of his food.

Still, as she seats on the two new sturdy chairs in her kitchen, she once more marvel at the quantities of food that the little guy has prepared for her and still wonders when the training would start. Sure, she was carbo-loading, storing energy within herself but soon she had to start using it, right?

And yet, she just lick her lips as she prepare herself for a new meal, all worries about training and exercise vanishing in front of the avalanche of food awaiting her.
The small chef grins at her, gesturing her to commence as he says his catchphrase.

Amy doesn’t even wait for his sentence she simply jump on the food, grabbing whatever there is in front of her, munching away as her taste buds are, once more overloaded with the heavenly taste of Frenchfry food. As she keep on eating, so she keep growing rounder and wider, as her clothes began once again to lift and stretch.

She just finished munching her way through a plate of ribs so big it seemed the entire ribcage of a cow, that Frenchfry place in front of her a platter with a single roasted turkey on it. Still, it’s a huge specimen, easily four or five times bigger than the average turkey. And yet to Amy it doesn’t seem to be nothing to be surprised of.
She simply smile as she grab one of its legs and snatch it away from the body, happily munching on it, as grease and liquefied butter dribble down from her lips on her multiple chins.

“Oh Frenchfry…it’s…all…so good! I can’t…I almost…am unable…to stop…eating it.”

Experiment 062 grins widely as he sees the turkey, fattened up under his own ministrations, disappear in few minutes through the mouth of Amy Santiago.
She has grown very large under his guidance, but yet, for him, she has still potential to grow more.

Way more.

As he think these thoughts, he doesn’t stop twirling around the kitchen always offering, and preparing, more to his newest pet/emergency rations.

As he hear the last of the turkey being swallowed he quickly twirl to her form offering a new treat, a massive six decker burger, full to the brim with fried bacon and grease.

Amy grabs the huge bun and smile in ecstasy as she bite down on it, the juices and the grease flowing in her mouth, and as she keep on eating it, her free hand caress the huge dome of her fattened stomach which has grown so large that she’s being unable to reach the table anymore.
11422421111114.title: An eventful week of meals later…

choices: Right after Lunch, as Amy is asleep, someone knock on her door...
During lunch her clothes burst off from her
After lunch, as she sleeps, Frenchfry plays with her gut
Skip to one more week in the future
114224211111141.content:
Amy slurped away the last remnants of her latest treats, as her body grew large in response, but she still looked hungrily at a massive multi-tiered cake that still stood on the table. Huffing and puffing she lifted her bloated arms to grab that treat, after all if Frenchfry had left it there, it meant she had to eat that too, right?, but unfortunately she didn’t seem to be able to reach it.

Grunting from the exertion she tried to crane her ow body forward but that too proved to be impossible. She even tried to move her barrel-like legs from side to side, trying to give more room to her mountainous belly but futilely.

She lay there for a minute in silence, trapped by her own huge boulder belly which was actually pushing her away from the table.

She didn't have time to emit one single whimper that she felt something land on her belly folds and, as a miracle, there was the cake slowly moving toward her. After the cake, over the dome of her distended gut appeared also Frenchfry, who had moved the cake well within reach of the ever growing piggy
.
“Bon Appetite!”

He said with his mischievous smile as he clambered down from that mountain and let Amy to consume in peace her new treat. But suddenly, a sound filled the kitchen. It wasn’t the sound of Amy’s jaws as they crunched and munched anything to oblivion, no.
It was a subtle sound, a creaking, that soon began to grow louder and more definite. Frenchfry stood motionless, watching the events unfold, even as Amy stopped eating and started to look around.

“E-Ehi French…Fry…what’s that…”

She never finished her sentence. Right at that moment the two chairs, which Frenchfry had picked personally for their sturdiness, gave their last breath of life and crumbled down in splinters, followed suit by Amy who collapsed on the ground making the entire room shake with the impact.

Experiment 062 gave himself a pat on the shoulder. The test had been a glaring success.

Sure, it had taken him more time than he thought but still he had finally managed in solving one of the problems related to those who consumed his meals. Usually those who ate anything he made grew rounder as balloons but also retained the typical lightweight of the same. But the food he had been preparing for Amy was very different.

It still let the person who ate it grow round as balloons, at first, but it also filled them with true fat, letting them getting heavier with time. Now he only had to see if also the second test was a success or not.

As he moved closer to Amy she began to sputtering in rage as she tried to lift herself from the ground, but finding it too hard to do it on her own.

“Wow…must be…truly in need…of energy if I…can’t even…stand up on my own.
Thanks Frenchfry.”

The experiment quickly moved beside the engorged girl and helped her standing up, as she finally was able to stand she looked in anger toward the pitiful remains of the two chairs.

“That’s what… happens when… I buy… cheap chairs…gotta remember it… for next time. Um? Frenchfry? What is it?”

Amy slowly turned around, even if had yet to consciously realize her true size, she still moved quite slowly just ti prevent more accident from happening. As she turned she saw that the small chef was moving toward one point of her house’s garage. She wanted to follow him but, her stare kept on going back toward the table which had still almost a quart of her entire meal awaiting her.

Experiment 062 saw this and smiled with himself.
She truly had become so addicted to not being able to do anything more than eating. Still he needed to see her in the garage and so he quickly twirled to her, placing himself on her shoulder, steering her toward the destination, while handfeeding her donuts and pastries.

Amy waddled slowly, her whole body jiggling at her every movement, still she kept going following the direction of her little friend as he gave her some more snacks to quench her hunger. As she reached the middle of the large, and empty, garage, she curiously looked around trying to understand why Frenchfry had brought her there. It was then that she noticed she was standing near a large metal plate.

As she turned her head toward the Chef he simply gave her one last cake to eat as he jumped on the plate and, on the far wall behind her appeared a series of numbers which, after a few seconds, read “25 lbs”.

“Oh! *gulp*…It’s a scale! You just wanted to weigh me, didn’t’ you?”

“Oui, madam.”

Amy made to speak but found herself unable to.

He had talked.

Frenchfry had never talked before. He had said something in a language she couldn’t understand but he had talked.

Letting that thought vanish, as her gut growled in hunger, she scrolled her shoulders, as much as she could, and moved forward onto the plate. Behind her she heard the beeping sound of the machine calculating and made to turn but the little chef was quicker than her. He swiftly forced her to stay still as he gave her a large apple pie to snack on as he went and checked the weight on screen.

Amy didn’t question the decision of her friend, she knew he was acting on her best interest. Also, the huge apple pie looked way too delicious to be left it waiting even for a few seconds. So, she simply dived with gusto into the pie, waiting for him to tell her the results.

“Mmmph…*gulp!*…Oof…Oh…Frenchfry…I was 135 last time I checked…I think…can you tell me how much have I lost?”


Frenchfry stood motionless, watching the numbers flickering on the wall. He barely registered the question from Amy, until his brain actually registered it and his smile grew even wider. This new food he had prepared, and used, was amazing. Not only was adding real fat to the person who consumed it or let them still be able to move, albeit way more slowly, but it was also erasing any health related issue as Amy was living proof of this.

Once more he read those digits on the scale and again he chuckled to himself.

No way could he tell her, her true weight.

With his addictive cuisine he had managed to get her, in little more than a week, to weigh a few pounds short of a full ton, exactly 2.200 pounds of pure lard!, and yet she still was able to move, albeit so slowly that it seemed she actually didn’t.

Turning around, he quickly gave another snack to his jumbo-sized pet, this time a humongous burger, easily the size of a full-grown pig, as he used some crayons to scribble on the wall how much she weighted.

Better, how much HE was going to tell her she weighted.

Amy kept eating at her huge burger, ignoring the creaks and the stretching sounds coming from her tent like clothes as they tried valiantly to contain her growing form. And yet she moved her stare to the wall where her friend had scribbled a three digit number on the wall.

“Um?” she huffed a little bit as she swallowed one more bite from her burger “Oh…134? Cool! I’ve lost… one pound… already? Your cooking…is awesome…Your diet…is awesome. I’m so…happy…you’ve been…assigned to me. Wonder how…thin…will I be…one month…from now…*Burp*!

That was…a good snack…Frenchfry.

But, you think…it’s time…for my first lunch…yet? I’m getting hungry…”

Experiment 062 grinned as he climbed her mountainous gut, perching on her should as he motioned her to go toward the couch, while pushing at her every step one more cake in her mouth.

“Good…Can’t…believe…how hungry…I’m feeling. Good thing…you’re having…me on this…multi coursed…meal filled…diet. So tired…and yet…so famished!”

1142242111111412.content:
Amy sat on her couch, the TV blaring in the background but she wasn’t having any attention toward it. All her focus was on the massive meal her friend, and chef, Frenchfry had prepared for her. There wasn’t a moment when her mouth was empty. At every moment, the small chef turned around and offered her something to munch on, be it burgers or be it cakes.

The poor girl laid there, bloated like a parade float, her body ever fattening under that deluge of treats, as her clothes stretched and creaked under the stress. However, not even that sound was enough to rose her from her frenzied hunger.

She had grown accustomed to that noise.

At her every meal there was an ominous creaking surrounding her but, since nothing ever happened, she had simply learned to ignore it.

Frenchfry couldn’t have been happier. Here he was, continuously feeding the over engorged girl at his side, constantly keeping her fed and full, every minute throughout the day. Letting her off only for those few hours of sleep she needed to keep going. Moreover, even though she now was growing so big that the room itself had began to be rather smallish for her size, still she acted as if she wasn’t aware of being over a ton.

He himself scarcely could believe it. However, he had proof under his eyes.

Yet, even though she was so big, even though he should have felt satisfied with her growth, he wasn’t.

For some reason he still did not understand, the oversized tanker beside him wasn’t yet appealing to his own hunger. Well, that wasn’t true. He was growing hungry, but he placated himself through the strays that roamed in the neighborhood, instead of focusing on her as his main meal.

He just couldn’t.

He truly wanted to see how big she could get, as if she was going to be his Masterpiece.

As he reflected, he never stopped moving, as his paws kept on providing food to the growing behemoth that sat on the couch. He had to stand on her dome-like gut in order to pass her food, since her arms couldn’t reach much beyond there. Suddenly though, the creaking to which Experiment 062 had also grown accustomed began to grow louder. Intrigued, as he pushed a massive multi-tiered cake toward Amy, he moved to check and realized that her latest tent like sweatshirt had reached its limit.
He could see the small tears and rips in it as it began to lose the battle against the ever-fattening body of Amy; grinning impishly, he turned on the woman and began to push more and more food into her greedy mouth, faster and faster wanting to see her bursting through her clothes.

Amy was in paradise.

She could barely remember what she had done ten minutes before, but every time her friend gave her something to snack on, she felt as if she tasted heaven itself. Yet, even though her lengthy mealtimes had accustomed her to massive portions, she was beginning to feel full.
Way too much full.

Yet, Frenchfry began to give her more food, without awaiting her to finishing chewing something before giving her something else. She found herself increasing her pace, trying to out eat the little chef, as he pushed more and more food to her. Sure, she could have stopped and slowed down but, her Captain had assigned the small French chef to take care of her and if he thought, she needed to eat more, who was she to disobey? Therefore, she endured and tried to match the speed of the small creature, opening her mouth and barely chewing before opening again to accept the next morsel.
Her growth began to speed up, her rounding out form started to push faster and faster against the tight confines of her clothes until they reached the point of no return. As Frenchfry kept shoveling food in Amy’s ever accepting mouth, her body seemingly stopped growing out, as it began to tremble instead. Taking his cue, the chef, left a small mountain of hot dogs, burgers and similar junk foods within reach of the growing behemoth and clambered down, to enjoy the show that was going to start at any moment.

Just as Amy swallowed down the last mouthful of food within reach, as she burped in satisfaction, there was a loud banging sound echoing in the room, as the sweatshirt and matching pants simply exploded out of her, the zip on the front of the shirt flew out as the clothes ripped and embedded itself deeply into the wall. The pants didn’t fare any better as they ripped to shreds, leaving Amy’s fattened body almost naked, but for her undergarments.

It was then that Amy tried to look around, having heard the bang, but she way too fat to do a simple thing as craning her neck. All she managed to do was to slightly twist her head on one side, trying to understand what had happened. Her field of vision was also reduced, for reasons she didn’t understand.
All she could see was the ceiling and the topmost portion of the room she was in, everything else was covered by a caramel colored mass of something.

“Fre-Frenchfry? What…is going…on? I..I feel cold…so suddenly. And…what was...that sound?”

The little chef smiled, as he stood right in front of the beached whale on her couch. He was right in front of her, but she couldn’t see him, as her massive engorged gut kept him hidden from view. Experiment 062 began to twirl on itself, as he sped up toward the kitchen, returning after only a few seconds later with more treats for Amy.

But the girl was confused.

She hazily remembered meeting the small chef the week before, as she learned that he was put in charge of keeping her healthy throughout her month-long vacation but could barely remember anything else.

What had she done during that week? Had she gone out for a jog as she usually did? Had she gone shopping?

All she remembered was the eating.

Or to be more precise, she remembered how sinfully tasty anything he had given her was. Yet, she now found herself on the couch, instead of the kitchen, and more shockingly, she couldn’t see anything that stood in front of her. Slowly she pushed with both arms against the couch, trying to stand from there but found out soon that it was going to be harder than she thought. So she began slowly rocking back and forth, using momentum to stand from the couch, until she was on her own two feet’s.

Yet, there was something incredibly wrong.

As she stood she turned around, quickly pushing her television from the pedestal where it was placed, pushing it on the floor where it crashed. Still she moved around herself, knocking things back and forth, as she tried to navigate through a room that she now felt excessively small for herself.

During all this, Frenchfry, silently followed her as she moved around, waiting his moment to strike, waiting to see the realization in her eyes if she was able to see how fat and big she had become.

Amy Santiago slowly waddled toward the kitchen, finding herself short of breath after only a couple of feet. How could she be so out of shape? What had happened in that week to let her get so out of shape?

As she stumbled in the corridor, she passed her wall-mounted mirror and stood speechless at her reflection.
She could see that she….

11422421111114122.content:
Amy looked at her reflection in the mirror and couldn’t believe her eyes.

She was huge! She was much bigger than a parade float.

However, how could that be? Hadn’t she followed Frenchfry instructions and meals? Well…Evidently not as good as she had thought. Deep in thought she didn’t even feel the small chef as he poked and groped her own body, she just kept trying to reach a decision.

Freanchfry, meanwhile was checking how good along Amy was getting. Yes, she was pretty big and fat, her face was still somewhat slim but the rest of her was humongous. Her belly, hugely round and almost perpetually bloated. So vast the not even four people could embrace it from side to side. Then her ass, such a huge mass of ass cheeks, jiggling wildly at her every move, forcing her to pass sideways inside double doorframes to avoid being stuck in there.

Yes she was growing right he just needed to know how she would act now that she was aware of her size.

“Frenchfry? I’m a huge Blimp! A colossal heifer! Please, you’ve gotta help me slim down! Please, with your diet didn’t I manage to lose one pound? Couldn’t we…I dunno…increase it somehow?”

Experiment 062 was awaiting for those words. With a wide smile, he began twirling around disappearing for a moment and appearing back a moment later, and he had gifts.

In one paw, he had a large bikini, big enough to hide everything that needed to be covered, in the other he had a paper on which he had scribbled:

“No worri…I Help ya. Do as I tel yu.”

Amy, seeing the note from her friend smiled back at him. Now she felt reassured, if there was someone who could help her, it had to be her little chef friend. As she nodded at him she quickly changed her clothes, abandoning the tattered remains she had still on and putting on what Frenchfry had brought her.

Then she followed him slowly, back on the couch, where he motioned her to seat. Trembling in anticipation, she waited until he appeared once more in front of her, hoisting up a massive multi-tiered wedding cake. Only by seeing such a huge confection, Amy’s mouth began to salivate, but yet, she quizzically turned toward her friend.

“A-Are you sure, Frenchfry? Won’t I grow even more?”

The little creature negated that scrolling his head as he tried to let her understand that she needed to eat to lose weight…that what he was going to give her was ‘Special Food’.

“Oh, so you mean that the more I’ll eat, the more I’ll lose? That sound fantastic, Frenchfry. In this case then, bring me more and more!”

“Bon Appetite!”

Without further ado, Amy began to eat, taking out huge pieces of the cake Frenchfry had brought to her, gulping them down as if there wasn’t going to be a tomorrow. Yet, for every bite she ate, her whole body grew fatter faster than before. Soon she found herself, once more, unable to reach those delicacies that her friend was giving to her. Yet Frenchfry acted quickly, he swiftly moved closer and closer the food toward the now mountainous girl, which could soon start back on eating. Moreover, while she was distracted enjoying some literal tons of food, Frenchfry began to clear the room of anything that could slow down her pet growth.

For days, almost nonstop, Frenchfry kept on feeding the girl, giving her just a few hours every now and then, to sleep and recover. For the rest of the time, he simply pushed more and more food inside her gullet. And Amy accepted it, now lost in a frenzied gluttony fueled by the mere presence of food.

It didn’t matter anymore if she was hungry, if there was food around, she had to eat it.

Not even when the size of the food she began receiving appeared out of any logic, she seemed to recognize that something wasn’t right. When burger the size of a fridge began to appear in front of her Amy simply smiled and began devouring it, when hot dogs the size of a surfboard were pushed against her lips she simply opened her mouth and crammed as much as she could within herself.

Amy had glutted this way for almost a week and the toll on her body was very discernible. She wasn’t capable anymore of moving her arms, those had grown way too big and heavy for her to lift. Not to mention the fact that were now so surrounded by the rest of her fattened body that she couldn’t move them even if she wanted to. Her torso had transformed into an amorphous blob like substance. There were so many rolls of fat, each so large to almost be a couch in itself, that she couldn’t even think about moving an inch of herself. Her rear had grown so vast that it had begun to push against the back wall of the room she was in, threatening to break it down. All in all, she wasn’t anymore a girl in a room…she had become the room. And yet she didn’t seem to realize it.

“Oh….French…Fry… More…bring…me…more…need…to lose…more…”

The little chef grinned within himself. Amy had now grown so big she almost filled the entire room, and due to this, he deemed her able to progress toward her next stage.

Becoming her meal.

He had only to decide how she was going to prepare her…

1142242233333332332222111.content:
Rocky entered her apartment's kitchen/dining room, following the smell.

When she entered, she couldn't believe her eyes. There, on the table, was a large feast. It contained a tray heaped with hamburgers, another filled with pizzas and a third with a mountain of French fries. There were also three large ice cream sundaes.

"Woah! Who made all this?" Rocky asked in surprise. Then, she heard something behind her.

"Bonjour!" Rocky turned to find herself looking at a small, grey alien. He had black eyes, a tail shaped like a spatula, a red nose, a white chief hat-like thing on his head, four arms and a small black moustache. He looked friendly enough, but Rocky was still skeptical.

"Um, hi. I'm Rocky Blue. Are you the chief Mom hired for the summer?" Rocky said. The alien nodded and smiled kindly. He then handed a card to Rocky.

"'Frenchfry, chief for hire'." Rocky read aloud. "Okay. Is it cool if I eat some of this yummy smelling food now?" She asked. Frenchfry smiled and nodded. "Bon Appetit!" He said to her.

Rocky slowly grabbed a large burger. "I usually don't eat meat, but these burgers do look tempting." She smiled. Then, she took a bite. Rocky's eyes popped wide as the flavor hit her mouth. It was like nothing she'd ever tasted!

After polishing off the first one, Rocky then shoved four of the big burgers into her mouth, bulging her cheeks out wide before barely managing to swallow them at once with a big gulp.

After scarfing down those burgers, Rocky then began devouring the pizza, shoving 1 whole pizza into her mouth by folding it up. Then, she went after the fries.

The fries were light, melty and crispy as she ate giant handfuls of them at once. "These are the yummiest French Fries ever!" She mumbled through her jumbo chipmunk cheeks as she looked at Frenchfry.

Rocky kept eating and eating, oblivious to the fact that her normally trim belly was starting to bulge out as she kept up her pattern of burgers, pizza and fries. Nor did she notice Frenchfry eyeing her growing tummy with an evil grin.

11422423323332223213.title: Both Frankie and Taylor

114224233233322232133.content:
Frankie was walking home from school, planning her next big prank, when suddenly, she heard scurrying from across the street. Moving over to the source of the sound, she saw a small creature searching through the garbage.

"Hey, little guy," she said as she picked it up. She doesn't recognize the creature. "Might be a ghost or something. Maybe I should take it home," she thought.

So she stuffed the creature into her backpack and went home.

Later...

"What is that thing?" Frankie's older sister Taylor asked as they examined it in the living room.

"Don't know, I found him on the streets, searching for food, so I thought to bring him here and give him some." Frankie replied.

Taylor looked skeptical. "You found him on the streets and just brought him here?" she asked. Seeing Frankie's nod, she said, "Then you better be careful so mom doesn't see it."

Suddenly, the creature ran out of the room. When the two girls prepared to chase after it, it came back with multiple platters of food, and placed them on the table. He also motioned for the girls to sit and eat.

Neither were that surprised to see him do so, but were skeptical to eat. But then, both their stomachs began to rumble, and both girls went to sit down and eat.

"Wow, these are great," Frankie said just as Taylor nods her agreement. "Can we keep it? Don't worry, mom will never know."

"Sure, but I'm not going to be the one to face her if she finds out," Taylor responds.

"Awesome. I think I'll call him... Frenchfry," Frankie said, just as she was eating a plate of fries.

The girls ate and ate, not noticing their growing bellies.
114224233233322232133.title: Frankie finds and brings him home

1142242332333222321331.content:
As the two girls kept eating, they kept getting bigger and fatter.

Their gain started in their bellies, but soon their backs started to grow, making them look round and spherical. And as they kept growing larger, their arms, legs and neck started to be covered up by their bodies. Soon both girls looked like round balls with heads, legs and feet.

Out of the two of them, Taylor seemed to have grown the most, looking slightly taller and much wider. And though smaller than Taylor, Frankie had still grown much larger than she was before, being the same height as she was before, but wider.

Both girls became massive balls, yet they didn't seem to realize that, until...
1142242332333222321331.title: They keep getting bigger

114224233233322232133112.content:
As Taylor kept eating and growing, her chair couldn't take the weight any more, and it broke.

"Whoa!" Taylor exclaimed as she started falling down.

Taylor tried to get up off the ground, but she couldn't, no matter how hard she tried. Then, she looked at herself and looked on in shock at her round body. As she continued to struggle with getting up, she also saw the expanded Frankie. But right now, she needs her help, so she said, "Frankie, can you help me out?"

As Frankie went over to where Taylor is, she broke out in a huge grin, and said, "What happened to you? And look how round you are." Seeing Taylor's frown, she continued, "Aw, don't worry. You look kinda cute as a giant ball." As she continued to laugh, Taylor said, "You're one to talk. Have you noticed how you look?"

It was then that Frankie finally looked down at herself, and she too stared in shock at her fattened body. "Hello? I'm still on my back here?" Taylor said to get Frankie's attention. Frankie then tried to walk over, she also realized that she was moving in a slow waddle, before getting near Taylor.

As she pushed Taylor to get her upright, she felt her sister's soft body, deducing that it was fat. As Taylor finally stood up, they both examined themselves. They both noted that their clothes had stretched to completely cover their bodies. Taylor then turned around, and Frankie saw how much her back had also expanded, and she craned her neck to confirm that she had also grown into a sphere shape.

"No no no this is bad this is bad," Taylor muttered in a panic. "I have gymnastics practice tomorrow. How am I supposed to do anything like this? What if my boyfriend sees me like this?" As she continued to ramble on in a panic, Frankie got her attention with a loud, "HEY!"

"Calm down. It's just fat, right? So let's just burn it off," Frankie said. Taylor looked at her in annoyance, wondering how she thinks they can work off this much fat, but she then sighed at waddled toward the door. Then...
