But just as the three of them were going to get out of their house, their own appliances began to grab them and transport them deep undergound.

Soon enough the three spies found themselves sitting in Jerry’s office, not so quietly grumbling for having been moved there so unexpectedly.

“Hi Ladies. Sorry, I know you’re just going to go on a short vacation but something came up. An important VIP has been assigned to us and it is our duties to protect him for all the time necessary until he can be transferred to a more secure facility.

This…err…Person must be kept under strict surveillance and to do so I have decided that one of you will be following him in the secret location he’s at.”

“What!?” the three spies exclaimed at the same time, each outraged but secretly wondering who was going to be forced to lose their summer vacation.

“Dears, I’m truly sorry for this but it is a necessary mission that need to be taken care of. Anyway…______ , you’ve been chosen for this mission.

If you need any assistance…you’re not going to need any of it.
Enjoy!”

As Jerry said that, a capsule surrounded the poor girl as she began to cry angrily for the injustice of it while, at the same time her friends waved her with an embarrassed smile on their faces.

Just as she was going to give to her friends and Jerry a piece of her mind, the capsule began moving, changing into a rocket and shooting out of the underground base toward the location of her mission.
123112121.title: So it begins…

choices: Clover notices something changed within herself
Clover is contacted by her friends…
1231121211.content:
A few hours later, Clover found herself in the hangar of an unknown base. Still angry for the loss of her summer vacation she almost didn’t catch the note that was left to her on a wall mounted board.

Angrily snatching the note, she began to read it to herself

‘Welcome to HVN01, also known as Heaven Base.

Your orders are simple. It is your duty to keep the VIP entertained, safe and in a stress-free mood. If it doesn’t conflict with your orders, you are free to roam the base and employ any of the facilities in it.

The entire base is automated, so for any request just grab the nearest requesting booth and/or, depending on the section you are in, use the voice generated command requests.

We must stress that the VIP has to be kept safe and secure.

That his requests have to be taken into consideration and agreed upon, unless they would place him in danger.

You’re going to meet the VIP in the following room. He’s been told to expect you.’


Clover crumpled the note in her hand and still quite testily opened the door, revealing the identity of the VIP she was supposed to take care of. Right in front of her appeared this strange creature, with a grey-blue skin, a spatula shaped tail and what resembled a chef hat protuberance coming out of his head.

“Who…and what are you, little guy? Are you the VIP?”

Experiment 062 quickly nodded his head, as he scribbled on a piece of paper his name.

“So, your name is Frenchfry? Well, nice to meet you. Now, let’s see what there is to do around here…”

Before Clover could do anything, the little creature grabbed her hand and quickly brought her to the massive canteen of the base, leaving her at one of the tables. A few moments later he then reappeared before her with a platter of hamburgers in tow.

“Bon Appetité” Frenchfry said as he motioned the girl to dig in.

“What? For real? What are you, a cook or something?”

Still, the food smelled delicious and she had to admit she was feeling quite famished, so she simply smiled and took a bite at one of the burgers. As soon as the bite was in her mouth she felt in heaven. It was good.

It was way more than good. Quickly she began scarfing down more and more of those delicious burgers in her mouth, as the little creature brought in front of her some panels he had prepared beforehand.

‘Hi! My name’s Frenchfry!

I can’t speak very well your language, so I prepared these!

I have been told to stay here as you would come and protect me from danger.

I am thankful for that.

So, I decided to return the kindness by preparing your food.

I’ve been told I can make very good food.

Hope we can be friends and that you enjoy my food!’

Clover had quickly destroyed the three burgers her new friend had given her and was feeling quite satisfied, yet as the little chef whirled in front of her a new plate with some hot dogs, she began eating them almost immediately, even though she turned toward him.

“Now…*munch*…don’t you get strange ideas. I’m here to…*gulp*…protect you so you don’t need to overwork yourself. Still, I appreciate the snacks…”

As Clover said that she didn’t seem to notice that her red suit seemed to be tighter on her body than a few minutes before. Frenchfry noticed it though, and a wicked gleam appeared in his eyes as he kept watching his would-be guardian as she stuffed herself with another platter of steamy burritos, hungrily cleaning the plate in a few minutes.

Yes, she was going to fatten up and balloon so easily…He only had to keep her focused on the eating…
1231121211.title: Blonde Bodyguard

choices: Move her to a hastily placed mattress in the kitchen
Provide her with an XL beanbag chair in the mess hall
Let her sleep off the food in her bed, preparing to keep her in there
Move her to a room where everything seemed bigger than she was
12311212111.content:
Clover leaned back on the bench she was seated upon. She burped a little and she dabbed her lips with a napkin. As she leaned back, she unconsciously caressed her belly, soothing it with gentle movement as her new friend, and protégée, slid a new plate in front of her.

“More? Oh, Frenchfry, I don’t know how you do it, but your food is delicious…But I’ve had more than enough. I couldn’t possibly…”

Right at that moment her belly grumbled hungrily as soon as she smelled the delicious food pushed in front of her.

“Well…I guess I can have one more plate.”

Quickly she leaned back toward the table and grabbed a slice of the humongous pizza her cooking friend had prepared for her. She didn’t even look closely at it, but simply gave it a big bite and munched on it as the delicious taste overloaded her taste buds. As she swallowed, she quickly began to eat faster and faster, starting soon to place slices one on top of the other, stuffing them then in her mouth. With each gulp, her own form began to grow slightly larger, becoming more and more round.

Yet she couldn’t stop, everything was too good, and she never felt full eating that stuff.

Without her noticing pizza soon became burgers and then changed again to burritos. As she kept blindly munching, her face began to grow messier and messier. Her eating frenzy making her act more and more piggish as sinfully tasty dishes kept on piling around her. Frenchfry kept providing more and more while, at the same time, tried to clean up the table so that he could place even more platters in front of her new friend.

As the meal progressed, though, Clover began to feel something that was disturbing her. As she shoveled more fries in her mouth, she kept having this feeling, as if something was constricting her. Still, she kept shoveling food in her mouth, trying her best to ignore that sensation. The little blue chef could see what the issue was. He spied her growing form, noticing how easily she was starting to become a rounded version of herself, but he also saw that her utility belt was restricting her movements. Becoming tighter and tighter as she ate more food.

Quickly he twirled back into the kitchen, coming back out a few moments later leaving a new plate of deliciously tasty burgers in front of the blonde spy. Clover stared hungrily at the new burgers, noticing how massive those were, and yet she felt an huger so powerful within herself that she couldn’t refrain from grabbing the first of them in her two hands, moving it toward her mouth. As she did so, the little alien moved closer to her and, with expert movements, he undid the utility belt, cautiously so that her rounding form wouldn’t bounce out now that it was freed.

As Clover gave her first bite to the humongous burger, she felt better, as that feeling of tightness had suddenly disappeared. Smiling, she proceeded in demolishing all the burgers her new friend had prepared for her. As time passed, Clover kept on eating and growing, soon enough her rounding out form began to be an issue itself. She was still feeling hungry, although many hours had passed with her gorging like a possessed mad man, and yet she was having difficulty in reaching the table.

“Frenchfry? I think there may be something wrong with this table…I can’t seem to reach it?”

For a moment she stood puzzled from her own question but, the blue alien was quick on his feet as he brought a vast container full of Chinese noodles right under her face.

“Bon Apetit!” he simply said and quickly began scooping up large morsels of it, feeding them to Clover, which gladly accepted them as if nothing had happened previously.

While the feeding was ongoing, though, the little blue alien used his other set of hands to slowly turn the table, positioning it right beside the blonde girl, so that she could have easy access to it. Clover, meanwhile, was on a cloud nine of well-being, she had lost all consciousness of time as she kept eating those delicious plates provided by the friendly alien cook. If she could reason with a clear mind she would have asked herself how she was capable of keep eating for that long without feeling a moment of pain but, feeling as good as she was she couldn’t care less about trivialities like those.

All she could ask herself was ‘What was going to be next’ and ‘if he was an alien how could he cook so well food from earth’. And yet, even though she might have thought those question she never asked them aloud, busy as she was to just enjoy the seemingly endless stream of food coming her way.

Frenchfry was constantly providing her new test subject more and more food, placing humongous plates right in front of her, specifically on her breast which were becoming quite a natural shelf on themselves. As he did, though, he also kept checking how she was coming along and, although he seemed slightly disappointed, he noticed that she was reaching her fullness point rather quickly.

True, his food would enlarge her more as he kept feeding her but, since she had to say there with him and no one else seemed to be coming to relive her, he also didn’t want to rush things too fast. He was still a Chef and any self-respecting cook had to savor their meals.

For that reason, as he handed her an extra-large bottle of soda, he simply watched as the sleeping pills he had added to it went to work making the rounding out agent sleepy.

Clover, on her side, had never felt so good, here she was performing the easiest job she had ever been assigned to and she was also enjoying it to booth. Yet, she noticed something strange going on, the fact that reaching the table was being a hassle or the fact that she felt strangely uncomfortable seating there as she was. These misgivings had brief life however, as she began to feel sleepy right after she quenched her thirst with the soda and so she simply fell asleep promising herself to verify those doubts later.

Seeing Clover asleep Frenchfry grinned, now he had all the time to make her feel more comfortable before proceeding once more with her growing fatter.

But how was he going to do that?
12311212111.title: A very well fed guardian

choices: …stop for now? Wouldn’t like to get chubby, you know?
…go check around the base to see what’s there is to do for fun?
…help me out of here? My back is killing me.
…stop with these rabbit-sized portions and move on to something more ‘filling’?
123112121111.content:
Frenchfry prepared everything cautiously, but in haste.

He knew that Clover was going to sleep for a while but wasn’t sure how long it was going to be before she woke. For this reason, he quickly moved a double wide mattress from one of the dorm rooms and placed it in the large kitchen of the base. Then he placed her on it as he prepared a new banquet for Clover to consume.

He knew that sooner or later she was going to realize how big she was getting but, with the addiction caused by his food and the tantalizing aromas coming from the kitchen he hoped she would get hopelessly addicted before realizing the changes to her own body.

As he stood there, wiping his slightly wet brow, he marveled at her mass.

When she had arrived in the base, she had been a curvaceous agent/bodyguard who could have weighted around the 120 pounds. Now he stood there silently, fixing in his eyes how big she had grown. True, his food normally caused people to grow rounder, but it wasn’t always the case, as he remembered the form of Pleakley which had grown massively flabby from his food.

In Clover case she had seemed to grow normally rounder, as she now had assumed an almost perfect sphere form the size of an over-inflated beach ball and, yet, he could see her breast refusing to conform with her spherical form, as they were beginning to grow larger than before. This, from Frenchfry point of view, meant that she could yet grow as a jelly like, flabby fat filled, mountain. Which was ok in his eyes, the less she could move around the less chances there were she could escape him.

As he stood there marveling at her, he noticed she was beginning to stir out of her sleep and curiosly noticed that already four hours had passed since he had given her the small dose of sleeping pills. Now, late in the afternoon, he moved closer to her preparing himself to provide her with a decent sized snack that he could munch on until it was dinnertime.

Clover woke up yawning, as she tiredly scratched herself unconsciously on the portion of her inflated belly she could manage to reach. She didn’t remember much from before, apart from arriving into the base and eating the delicious food of the little alien chef. As she thought about that she realized something smelled good around her and quickly she scanned her surrounding, noticing with a curios glance that she wasn’t anymore in the mess hall, but in the kitchen.

“Mh? Frenchfry? Why are we in the kitchen?”

As she looked around she fel her belly rumbling in hunger, even though she didn’t exactly remember how much she ate at lunch, she thought strange that she could be hungry once more. Still, as she turned toward the Alien she saw again his cardboards frames with his wiggly writing on it.

‘Moved you here so I can cook under your guard…

You resting is good. Didn’t want to wake you up…

Still gotta practice to become perfect in cooking…

With you here I can also ask you opinion on food.

Hope not made mistake…

…Still friends? ‘

Clover smiled at the blue little guy as she brought herself to a seating position, ignoring subconsciously on how her full belly began to overlap her thighs, and replied to him with a nod.

“Of course, we’re still friends. And I’ll try my best to help you achieving your dream, if that is your wish. Just remember that wherever you go, I’ll come too. Still got to protect you from any dangers that may be lurking around.”

As that Frenchfry smiled and quickly pushed onto her a large platter with what appeared to be bite-sized minced pies. She accepted the plate, noticing how big it was but admitting with herself that she was going to have just a few of them. Still, as she placed the first in her mouth, and chewed on it, her taste buds were caught unprepared for the onslaught of the rich flavor and the amazing taste those mini-sized pies had.

“Oh God! These are so good Frenchfry!”

“Bon Appetit’!”

Clover soon found herself enthralled by the rich taste of Frenchfry creations and, in a rapid succession, she demolished the platter of small minced meat pies, quickly followed by another large platter with a deliciously large meat lover pizza, a baker’s dozen burritos, each two times larger than as they were usually made and kept on eating on whatever the little blue chef brought to her.
Frenchfry, as he had prepared a large pile of junk food at a reaching distance to her, began moving around her growing form, inspecting it and, when she was totally taken by some dish, he actually played a bit with her body fat, watching it jiggle and sway under his touch. Naturally he didn’t let himself be distracted and, every few minutes, he added more and more dishes to the pile leaving the girl unable to move away from the delicious food.

Clover felt like she was in heaven.

Everything the little guy prepared seemed to be better than the last dish she consumed. And, on top of that, by being surrounded with the tantalizing aroma’s coming from all around her she felt her hungry stomach pushing her to have always more. As time passed her form began to grow more massive, her whole body began to lose its spherical shape and began to grow flabbier. Her belly, even though was constantly stuffed, had begun to overlap her lady parts, moving inch by inch on her tights, her arms had already begun to have some small bingo wings which jiggled to and from, every time she grabbed a new dish or platter. Her face, though, seemed comparatively normal, there were some cherubic hints here and there, such as a hint of double chin forming up, or some more wrinkles around her lips whe she smiled but that was it.

For hours she kept eating, clearing out several trays of hot dogs, donuts and fries. Quickly following them with bowls of greasy fried bacon, KFC and loads of deep-fried pork ribs. And as she kept clearing plate after plate, her hunger didn’t seem to be abated at all.

“Oh…*urp*…I truly wonder how…*glurp*…you manage to make EVERYTHING you prepare taste so good, Frenchfry. I could go on…*belch*…forever on your food.

It’s just so good…”

As she kept eating so she kept expanding, her form beginning to fill lusciously on the mattress she had been placed on. In fact, for not even a minute she seemed to realize where she was sitting, so enthralled by the onslaught of foodstuffs pushed on her by the seemingly French Alien Chef. And yet, as she was clearing out the last custard pie, from the latest batch he had given her, she moaned in joy as she tried to rub her now humongous belly, which resembled by itself an over-inflated beach ball.

In doing so she seemed to woke up from the constant gorging she had been going on for the last hours and yet, she still was feeling quite famished. Still ignorant of how her body had changed, Clover stopped eating for a full minute, which was a feat already on itself, and turned a questioning look toward the little blue chef, as she was deeply thinking about something.

She knew something wasn’t right. She had woken up from her nap in the early afternoon and, by glancing at the clock on the wall, it was almost evening now, so something wasn’t right. But she wondered what it could be.

Could it be that eating all that food for that long, wasn’t, truly, healthy for herself? Or maybe it was the fact that as time passed she felt more and more uncomfortable with her position? And yet she knew she was still hungry, so maybe she had to stop nibbling around on snack food and needed something more substantial?

With those doubts in mind she turned toward the chef and asked.

“Uh…Frenchfry? Don’t you think it’s time to…”
123112121111.title: Addicting food + Kitchen odors = Ravenous hunger

choices: She wakes up and doesn’t see anything wrong in her body.
She wakes up and blindly believe to have put on just a few pounds.
She realize how big she has become but can’t overcome her hunger
She realize she’s going to be big as a house if this keep up & tries to avoid it
1231121211114.content:
Clover had though long and hard about her situation and, in the end, she turned toward the little blue chef her doubts, voicing them openly.

“Uh…Frenchfry? Don’t you think it’s time to…stop with these rabbit-sized portions? I mean, they’re good and all but since it’s almost dinner time I was expecting something more filling than a few snacks.”

Even though she had felt herself different and her position there on the mattress gave her some discomfort, the thing that most remained impressed in her was the fact that she still was feeling ravenously hungry. Frenchfry smiled with glee at her question and answered right back to her by quickly offering a large salad bowl filled to the brim with pasta covered in heavy cream, fried eggs, cheese and some, rather large, pieces of bacon. As he placed the bowl under her nose the poor girl could do nothing but dive right into it, feeling each morsel travel down her throat and slam heavily in her already stuffed, but still hungry, belly.

“*Mmph*…so good…this is Carbonara, isn’t it? It’s so delicious…That’s what…I was talking about.
Thanks, Frenchfry!”

Clover kept stuffing her mouth with morsel after morsel of the heavy pasta, enjoying each one as if it was going to be the last. And yet, in a short twenty minutes she had managed to clear the bowl, for which she worded her satisfaction with loud sounds.

“Ooh…*Buurp!*…so good…*Belch*..so tasty”

Still, as the now empty bowl was taken away from her field of vision she hadn’t time to regret that the pasta had been cleared, since Frenchfry quickly placed under her eyes a new platter. This time there were five large cuts of pork belly, all of them completely covered in a rich cream-like sauce made mainly from butter and white wine. Once more the aroma’s alone were capable of giving new vigor to the overfed girl, shown by the fact that she viciously attacked the plate as soon as it was left in front of her. As she kept cutting pieces of the five cuts of meat, she noticed at the last moment that her chef friend was advancing, leaving beside her plate another one, chocked full of some small crispy sandwiches, stuffed with kebab meats and melted cheese, to be used to scoop up the cream from her current platter.

Hoggishly, Clover didn’t wait for an invitation, munching on both the meats and the baked breads her friend had left in front of her.

Mixing the flavors, though, was a grave mistake from her part, since it made what she was eating so delectable that she forced herself to eat faster and faster, trying to cram as much as she could in between her lips.

This treatment continued well into the late hours of the evening, each time she cleared a plate, Frenchfry swapped the empty ones with more complicated, and heavier, dishes to which she found herself unable to resist. At around midnight, as Clover was starting to feel tired and sleepy, the alien Chef brought forth his master pieces, trying to goad the already overstuffed girl to gorge even more.

“U-Uh? Oh…*yawn*…Frenchfry….mmh…I think I may be….ready to…call it a…*urp*…night…”

The blonde Whoop agent almost drunkenly turned her gaze toward her little friend and stood momentarily curious about his shape, until she realized that he was hefting on his head a massive devil’s food cake. It was as big, if not even bigger, than her friend and she shockingly stared as it was brought right in front of her.

“Uh…Frenchfry? I-I think that that... may be best to keep it for tomorr…”

Before she could finish speaking, the small alien climbed on her and without a word pushed a slice of that cake in her mouth, forcing her to chew it and taste it. As soon as she had enjoyed the wonderful taste of that cake all her misgiving melted away as snow in the sun, as she began to eat more ad more of that dessert. Still, with the day she had, she soon found herself unable to move her arms very well, but thinking she was only tired she didn’t put too much worry on it.

Still, she looked at her friend and opened her mouth, a clear invite for him to help her.

As Frenchfry gleefully pushed more and more of the cake into Clover, she found her hunger stir up once more. And even though she truly felt tired and sleepy, she couldn’t help but wonder if maybe a pre-night time snack wasn’t the best course of action.

‘Only this dessert. Only this and then I’ll go to sleep.

Well…maybe I could have something else…a small piece of souffle? Maybe some ice cream?

Mmm…Maybe with some donuts as a side?

So good…everything is too good…’

With her hunger awakened once more, Clover found herself unable to resist temptation, even though she was quickly feeling more and more tired, her hunger and her newfound gluttony were pushing her to keep going. As soon as the cake was cleared from its platter, a new dessert took its place. Strawberry coated, Vanilla covered, cakes of all kinds and sizes were pushed in front of the engorged girl who kept repeating herself that she was going to have one last bite and nothing else.

But she kept going.

Frenchfry, seeing as her piggy was still willing to go on simply provided more food for her, soon increasing the size of each dessert he brought to her lips. Meringue the size of a small wheel, dozen upon dozen of chocolaty bloated donuts, entire pans of cookies and tubs of ice cream. Yet, as he saw her bloat larger and wider until she almost entirely covered the mattress with her fattened form, he finally decided to stop.

Yes, it was only the first day and most of the food he had pushed into her was going to be digested, and so her now hugely bloated form was going to shrink some, but he had made his point with her. If he managed to stir her hunger, she would inevitably fall into gluttony, gorging herself without a care for anything else in the world.

Clover stood there with her mouth hanging open, her lips and chins covered in frosting and sugar coating, and it took her a while to realize that nothing else was being pushed her way. Burping loudly, as her hugely overstuffed stomach had now to process all those calories she had ingested, she finally felt her hunger be overtaken by her need to sleep.

“Oh…Alright…Frenchfry…guess I’ll call it…a night… See you…in the morning….”

As she said that, she slowly fell back, all but collapsing on her back, crushing on the mattress, feeling finally full and content. As she slept, she dreamed of being in a wonderful spa, where everyone was ther to assist her, helping her in everything and with everything.

The alien chef simply grinned, thinking that she was going to be in a surprise on the following day.

Would she realize how big had she gotten or, would she simply fall back in her indulging gluttony, letting her hunger to drive her around for another day full of food?

In the meantime, he simply went back to the kitchen, taking inventory and restocking the ingredients he needed to provide her with a hearty breakfast on the following morning.
1231121211114.title: Waking up the beast from its slumber

choices: Arcade Room. Players might need extra sustenance to play and win!
Pool. Mud bathing in chocolate seems to give an extra soft skin.
Country Fair Room. Who would renounce to a game of Fill-The-Whale-Up?
Web Cafè. The net is fun! But it can also change your view on what FIT & FAT is
12311212111142.content:
It was morning when Clover woke up from her peaceful slumber. She slowly rose from the mattress on which she had fallen asleep the night before, moving away a cover that, most probably, her friend Frenchfry had placed on her during her sleep. As she woken up completely she stood from the ground, feeling rather winded by that alone, and saw herself in a different light from the previous day. As she stood up, still in the middle of the kitchen, she realized that she had grown from what she was used to remember.

As she looked around, finding the empty kitchen a strange vision indeed, she still looked at herself figuring out how big of a difference it was against what she was used to see of herself. Slowly she began to waddle out of the kitchen still deep in thought.

‘Strange…My breasts seems larger than before an also my paunch seems way bigger than usual.
Could it be that I’ve put on weight?

It’s true that yesterday I’ve done quite a bit of taste testing Frechfry’s recipes but, still…Mh…and yet, doesn’t seem to be nothing too big to handle.
Nothing a fitness girl like me can’t handle.

I’ll just do some training here and there and will quickly return to my normal.
Yeah…not more than a pound…or a pound and half, that’s for sure.’

As she waddled through the kitchen, going on with her inner monologue she couldn’t imagine that all those ideas were only lies fed to her by her mind. In fact, Clover had massively grown from the previous day. Her body bloated out in all directions, from her thighs, which were almost touching each other, forcing her to waddle around, to her arms which now sported definite bingo wings. Her belly had surged forward, overlapping on her suit, covering her lady parts, shaping up into a dome that reached right under her now massive breasts. These last were starting to lose their perkiness, forced to the side by her voluminous belly.

Her face hadn’t changed much, it had a second chin with a bit more definition to it, even though still it couldn’t be called that, but another part of her that had drastically changed were her hips and ass. Her hips had been covered in a thick stratum of blubber and her ass had started to jiggle at her every step. Yet, all this seemed to be hidden from her eyes, as it was reinforced from the fact that her red suit was still holding.

Poor Clover couldn’t face the truth that in almost one day she had passed from being 120 pounds to almost 250, if not even more, and, even though she knew that her suit was built of an extra elastic material, she seemed to ignore that fact, preferring to think that nothing major had changed within herself.

As she exited the kitchen she saw the familiar figure of Frenchfry, adding the finishing touched to one of the mess hall tables, as it was entirely covered with plates of breakfast food. Pancakes drowned in molter butter and maple syrup, Waffles covered in chocolate, large donuts covered in sprinkles and powdered sugar, cakes and much more. Clover soon felt her hunger stirring from the depths of her body and so didn’t waste a minute to move slowly toward the table. As soon as she was seated, Frenchfry took the liberty to wrap around her neck a large napkin and then motioned her to start her meal.

The girl didn’t have to be asked twice.

Rapidly she began gorging on the breakfast food, unknowingly consuming enough of it that could have lasted for a large family, and yet she seemed not to care for, once she started, she couldn’t manage to stop on her own. A bite out of the pancakes pile, smothering syrup and butter on her chin and then a forkful of waffles. Then she grabbed a donut and used it to collect some maple syrup from her plate, glazing it as a large part of it went in between her lips. A handful of bacon strips alongside with a mouthful of cookie dough ice cream. Messily, she began to clear out plate after plate, feeling herself reinvigorated as more and more food went down into her gullet.
And yet, she noticed, Frenchfry wasn’t replenishing the food on the table.

Curiously she turned her gaze toward him, noticing he had within his paws, yet again, another set of his cardboards frames.

‘Good Morning! Enjoy breakfast!

Today I wanted to look around the base

I’ve made plenty snack should we get hungry

But I think there is much fun to have around here.

Whe you finish we will go exploring.

For now, enjoy the meal!

It is important to have enough…if you want more just ask’


Clover nodded as soon as she finished reading and grunted positively as she kept shoveling fried bacon strips and greasy sausage in her mouth. It was a good idea, actually, she could jog beside Frenchfry as he explored and so she could manage to lose whatever had she gained from the previous day. Still, as she demolished an entire pan of apple fritters, she realized that most of the plates surrounding her were already empty but she was still a bit famished. Due to this, as she finished to chug down a pitcher of chocolate milkshake, she asked to her friend if he could prepare just a little bit more for her.

She didn’t want to spend too much calories during her jog and breakfast was, as they said, the best meal of all.

The alien cook simply smiled and, after having twirled into the kitchen, he came out of it bringing forward a large pan choked full of almost one pound of fried bacon strips, a similar quantity of greasy sausages and eight extra-large hotdogs. The girl smiled as she saw all those goodies coming toward her and quickly put her maw to work on them, clearing away the pan in a record time.

As soon as she was done with her ‘breakfast’ she collapsed against the back of the chair she was seated on, breathing deeply as she recovered from her meal, her belly bloated and hard as a rock as it had take once again its classical dome-like appearance.

Still, a few minutes later, as her belly rumbled as it began the hard task of digesting the humongous meal she had, she began walking beside her friend as they moved deeply into the base, all thoughts of jogging cleared from her mind.

Frenchfry, in truth had already explored the place and, during the night, had managed to change quite a few of the devices that were sitting around for the comfort and the relaxation of the personnel that, seemingly, had to be there for work.

As the pair walked/waddled around, they soon passed several rooms which appeared interesting, although quaint, to the blonde overfed girl. As they moved through the base she saw a room called ‘Arcade Games’ which seemed full of the usual assortment of videogames, although these seemed to be more food related than anything else.

Then she saw the signs for a pool, along with a steam room and a relax room. These three seemed interesting enough, although the pool didn’t seem to be filled with water but with a rather brownish liquid, still she couldn’t say for sure as they didn’t enter the room, preferring to explore some more before deciding.

The next section of the base seemed to be reminiscent of a common country fair, there were booths with games and stands for classic food as corndogs and popcorn. Some of the game’s booths had a strange design to them and they intrigued her a bit, so she promised herself to go there when she had a bit of time. Finally they stopped to think on what they were going to do beside what appeared to be a room full of eerily looking chairs which had a metal helmet on top and various tubes coming in and out of it, the room was marked as ‘Web Café’ so she thought that they had to be some kind of internet browsing seats.

Yet, as they stopped on a bench, Clover felt her belly grumbling and before she could say anything a quite large meatball sub appeared in front of her. As she began munching on it, she looked at her friend trying to understand which room he wanted to check first.

Frenchfry looked gleefully at the girl beside him, all it had took for her to start eating anew was barely fifteen minutes of walking around. He smirked as he saw that she was also starting to sweat a bit and so he decided which room was going to be the best to let her ravenous hunger and unbridled gluttony to go free or maybe he could bring her deeper and see what else awaited them there?
12311212111142.title: The difference between seeing and believing

choices: Hibernating Bear. Eat as much as a bear…or two…or four…you get the idea.
Food Vs Man. A battle of endurance between girl and machine
Fill-The-Whale. Pumping up girls with heavy calories shakes since 1999.
Check in the back for more booths or pass through the food stands again…
123112121111423.content:
As Clover demolished her sub, and the following couple more, she noticed that her friend rose from the bench and began moving toward one of the rooms they had checked a few minutes before. Slowly she did the same and, although she noted how winded she did feel doing that, she dismissed once more any issue relate to her weight by reasoning that she had just ate and so it was only the additional weight keeping her down.

As she stood she quickly moved beside her fried and saw that he had entered the Country Fair room and had begun moving through the various stands and booths, checking with the automated assistants that were in charge of each. She quickly did the same but, instead of simply going through as Frenchfry did, she took her time at each stand.

When Frenchfry had passed the last of the food stands he turned to look at his bodyguard and smiled a bit seeing as she was still waddling through, with her arm full of all kind of junk food available in that room. She seemed not to notice that she was also going at them with incredible speed, so that every time she received an armful of food, she had mostly cleared them all out by the time she had reached her next stand. After a while, though, she managed to reach him and he smiled widely as he saw her, for she had bloated quite a bit under the influx of all those sugary and greasy calorie bombs.

Still, even though she had just eaten enough food to last for a couple of days, Clover accepted graciously some of his kebab bread buns as a quick pick me up.

“So…*Munch*…Frenchfry…*Gulp*…Do you already…*burp!*…Sorry. Do you know already what kind of games would you…like to do?”

Clover, literally tearing through the buns her friend had given her, still turned to him to see what fun was there to do since he had already explored more than her had. She did find it strange that he seemed to know his way around so early but, with her mind now focused mostly on food, she did not dwell on it too much. The little alien couldn’t speak but, as he pointed at each booth he had checked out he let the girl beside to choose which one could be tried out for first.

“So…Let’s see…Fill-The-Whale? One player sits in the booth… while the other solve a puzzle… to let a liquid of choice to flow through the pipes… to reach it? Well, that sounds fun but…I don’t think I’d like to solve anything.
Maybe I could sit in the booth for now?

Then what else we have…Golden Chicken, Hibernating Bear and Food Vs Man competition?

Hmm…Golden Chicken, shoot at the chicken on screen and win a prize. Shoot the Golden one to get better prize and bonuses. Nice!

Hyber…Hibrn…The Bear one, Help the bear on screen to collect and consume food for the winter sleep. Price awarded at every game. That’s a cool one too.

And then, Food Vs Man, one decides the menu of the robotic chef, the other play as the contestant. Wins big prizes each round who gives up for last.”

Clover found herself salivating despite herself as she checked the gaming booths, feeling her hungry belly rumbling in approval at each of those booths that Frenchfry had chosen.

“Well, all of them seems to be fun. Do you want to start with one in particular?”

Frenchfry had hoped that the girl would choose something on her own but, without worrying about it he moved toward the one called Golden Chicken. As they approached it they saw that it was a common enough booth, with the addiction of a comfy-looking sofa in front of the screen and some kind of chute at head height level of the player. With a smile, Clover moved her rather large body into the booth, sitting comfortably on the sofa, realizing that it wider than she had thought at first. Still, she grabbed the fake gun placed on the armrest and nodded toward her friend so he could start the game.

On the screen appeared a rather low budget picture of some farm field and overlapping it some brown chickens began to move randomly around, although rather slowly. Clover held the gun tight and shot toward one of them. As she pull the trigger a somewhat low key drill went out and in the middle of the screen appeared the words “Head Shot!”.

Following suit, from the chute in front of her a large piece of deep-fried chicken breast was pushed out and landed directly in her open mouth.

Clover, although surprised, munched on it quickly, savoring the taste of that piece. With a smile she began shooting again and again at the screen, as every time the machine pushed forward more and more of those deep-fried chicken pieces. What she failed to notice was that even when she missed her shot, the machine still gave her a prize and so she kept on munching without a care in the world.

At a certain point, after a hundred shot’s had been fired, the screen went dark and a golden writing appeared on it.

‘Bonus Stage!’

Once more the screen returned to its low budget picture but this time, instead of normal chickens, there were literally tons of golden chicks roaming about. As she swallowed the last piece of chicken breast, she felt herself quite weighted down from all that fried food and yet her hungry stomach rumbled loudly, asking for more. Licking her lips, she shot at the screen and, as before, a low-key drill reverberated around her, signaling the arrival of her prize.

This time tough, the chute itself opened like a flower and presented itself in front of the girl, just like a tray, as an entire fried chicken landed on it right in front of her eyes. On screen, she noticed a small warning which she quickly read it over.

‘Attention: All bones have been removed from the prize. Buttery fried structure has been used to keep the shape of the prize itself. Enjoy!’

As her eyes glazed with hunger, Clover dived right into the rather large chicken, taking huge mouthful out of it, trembling in pleasure as she felt the grease and the buttery goodness of it flow down her throat at each bite. As soon as the chicken was consumed, Frenchfry took his chance and shot once more against the screen. This time the low-key sounded for a bit longer and two fried chicken landed on the chute-tray for Clover to consume. The girl was prey of her gluttony and, as if starving, she launched herself once more at the pair of fried chickens, ravaging them rapidly as she moaned in enjoyment for the heavenly taste.

This process repeated itself for quite some time, until Clover collapsed against the back of the sofa, her mouth drenched in grease and butter. Burping quite loudly she looked at the screen, realizing that she had reached only the fifth level of the bonus stage, with more than other ten levels for her to face.

As she kept belching, and feeling her stomach somewhat content, she put the fake gun down and turned toward her friend.

“I-I guess…*beelch!* I guess I’m still…good at shooting…things down…*Urp!*…aren’t I?
Still, why don’t we…check another one and…maybe…try this one again later on?”

For a moment, Frenchfry thought to have been found out but, he quickly realized she had only reached her fullness point for chicken. But he was sure that, giving her a few minutes rest, she could be pushed to gorge anew on a different machine. For that reason, he nodded and began to get out of the booth, slowly followed by the girl who had to move even more slowly than before.

With all the fried chicken she had consumed her body had grown wider and larger than before. Her globular belly was now so big that her poor suit hadn’t been capable of keeping the fight any longer and had ripped as she played the Chicken game. Her dome shaped belly, in fact was now overlapping on her thighs, almost obscuring them up to the middle, and still it was so full that it pushed onward making it difficult for her to move.

Yet, in Clover mind there wasn’t anything wrong. She was just feeling cramped from sitting for so long in a position she wasn’t used to. The poor girl was getting so focused on food that anything else was being pushed aside or covered by blatant lies.

The alien chef didn’t give her a chance to think about it anyway, as he grabbed her hand in his and began to steer her toward the next booth which was…
123112121111423.title: Cotton Candy does a body good

choices: Return to the game, force her to play and outgrow the couch
Give her a ‘snack’, after all that activity she deserves some filling calories
Help her out of the couch and brig her to her room to rest and recover
Let her nap there, to rest before playing some more games
1231121211114231.content:
As Clover was still breathing deeply, she felt her friend dragging her toward a new game booth.

She smiled at his impatience but, soon, joined in the fun of it. After a brief waddle they stopped in front of the game booth of the Hibernating Bear. Clover felt herself sluggish and tired, as if she had just performed a marathon and so, without even looking, she sat on the comfortable couch in front of the screen.

As she did so an electronic voice started from the speakers of the booth.
‘Player 1 Selected! Awaiting Player two to continue.’

Clover looked at the screen, as she felt her globular belly rumbling in hunger as the small walk had awakened it and saw a poorly drawn landscape made to resemble a stone cave. On the bottom floor of the cave there was a room marked as ‘Player 1’ while the icon of a hand marked as ‘Player 2’ flashed intermittently. The girl quickly gestured toward Frenchfry to join the game and as soon as he had a joystick in his paws, the voice returned confirming the second player and providing instructions.

‘Player 2 Selected! Starting game!

Welcome explorers to the world of Bears! Player 2, help our furry friends bring the food needed for the owners of the cave to survive winter! Player 1, Assist the owners of the cave in evaluate the usefulness of each food item brought in! At the end of each round a bonus stage will start depending on how good you have been in helping the poor famished bears.

GAME ON!’

As the screen flashed once the game started and Clover saw that throughout the map several icons of different foods were scattered randomly. She stared as her friend began pointing and clicking toward one item, a large cake, and saw some small character bears move to that location and returning with the precious cargo until they left it inside the room marked with her name.

At that point, from the front of the machine a tray emerged and brought toward Clover a similar cake to the one shown on screen, while a small bear character animating as if it was eating the cake. Shrugging she took the cake from the tray and began eating it, noticing that as she’s clearing the tray, her score points went higher. She had barely cleared the tray when she noticed that another food was being brought into the cave, the tray from which she had just consumed the treat, beeped once and, swiftly returned inside the machine only to emerge back again holding now a plate of steamy hot dogs.

Grinning, Clover nodded toward Frenchfry and began eating the hot dogs as fast as she could, trying to release the tray before the next food item was going to be delivered. The two of them proceeded like this for a while, with Clover eating everything that the machine brought forth and Frenchfry doing his best to deliver the food as fast as he could. The girl watched in awe as her score began to rise higher and higher and felt somewhat prouder upon when she reached the ten thousand points and the electronic voice began to talk once more.

‘Congratulations! Level 1 Cleared! Bonus Stage 1 Unlocked!

Congratulation Explorers! Now that the food has been piled up, it’s time to give it to the bears!
Player 2, push the food from the cave toward the hungry bears, help them to reach satisfaction!
Player 1, assist the bears in clearing their food hoard, do not leave a crumb behind!

BONUS STAGE…GAME ON!’

As the screen went online again, the blond girl saw that her friend was playing around with his pad trying to push with his character at the pile of food on screen, sending each time some items from the pile to the bottom floor of the cave where the famished bears were. Once food arrived there, the machine would open and push toward her trays filled with whatever item Frenchfry had pushed with his character.

At the moment, for example, there was a vanilla sheet cake, some donuts and a medium sized milkshake waiting for her to be polished. Next, on the screen, there were several other food icons flashing meaning that more and more food was waiting to be issued to her. Clover began to re-think her position to play this game but her gluttonous side had other plans for her. Under the avalanche of addicting food that she had found herself subjected to in the last few days, her gluttony had grown exponentially. So, while at first, she began to worry, after a bit she relaxed, realizing that it was ok to splurge occasionally. Her mind quickly adapted her point of view, overwriting her own doubts.

Now free of any doubt or guilt, Clover let her hunger and gluttony take control over her actions. This meant that after a moment in which she was only staring at the goodies in front of her she simply nose-dived into them, swallowing morsel after morsel, working as fast as she could to clear out everything it was presented to her.

‘It’s just a snack. Whoever heard of not participating in the fun of your friends?
I’ve got nothing to fear…My metabolism will take care of anything in excess…’

Frenchfry saw Clover momentary lapse and he began thinking that his fun was soon going to be over but, after a few moment he clearly saw her posture getting more relaxed as also her expression began to soften. It didn’t took him long to figure out that the girl was still oblivious to the changes to her own body, be it because she didn’t want to admit them or because she truly couldn’t see them. Still, he could only be delighted in seeing her going without any brake on the sweets that the machine booth had provided her and he himself did his best to keep the flow of food toward her as fast as he could.

They had started that tour of the base on the mid-morning, but when she finally collapsed once more against the back of the sofa it was already late in the afternoon. As he stopped the game, motioning to the girl to go back to their rooms, Frenchfry couldn’t avoid giving a long stare of appreciation to the bloated young woman beside him. After almost half day of eating Clover was truly overstuffed and engorged. Her bloated gut protruded in front of her, covering effectively the view of her feet and even her breast, which had also grown larger, couldn’t cover her bloated middle. Still, the delusional girl, wasn’t able to discern this situation as something she had to be afraid of. She still kept believing the lies she herself subconsciously made.

She tried to rise from the couch, to follow her friend , but realized that, even though she pushed, her body didn’t want to budge.

‘Strange…I must have kept a wrong position as I sat and now my legs won’t move. Yeha, that must be it…’

As she struggled some more, she realized she wasn’t able to lift herself and so turned to her friend asking for some assistance.

“H-Hey Frenchfry…Could you give me a hand? This couch must be really small and I…I can’t get up.”

The little blue alien grinned in seeing her in that position and wondered what should he do to get her free.

He could start the game anew, letting her grow some more, or begin feeding her a ‘healthy’ snack on his own until she simply broke the couch under her massive size, but that would mean to put even more stress on her body, which he wanted to avoid in doing. Or he could simply use his own strength to release her and help her standing, so to move her somewhere more comfortable to shed some of her newfound largeness.

Of course, he could also motion her to stay there, to take a well-deserved nap, thus shedding some additional size, while gaining some more weight so to be ready for a second round of the Games Booths.

Truly a dilemma on his side. In the end he decided to…
1231121211114231.title: Hibernating Bear! A game which grows on YOU!

choices: A really gut-burtsing, feast-like proportioned breakfast
Needing to slow it down a notch
wake her up again, tricking her into having sleep all day long...
let her take the lead. Let's fattne her up at her own pace...
12311212111142313.content:
Frenchfry knew that more preys weren't going to come soon enough and, also, as a chef he had to savor every aspect of his meals. Including the preparation of it.

For this reason he moved near the over-bloated girl and helped her out of the couch she was stuck upon. Thanks to his strength he managed to let the armrest of the couch apart of that little needed to release Clover from there. The girl then managed, after a few tries for momentum, to stand on her own and she quickly grabbed the little alien chef, encasing him in a tight hug.

“Oh, Frenchfry! Thank you so much! You’re such a good friend to me.
Now…” she said as she still had him in between her arms “What would you like to do?”

The little alien was enjoying the hug way too much, to be enclosed to so much soft fatty tissue was distracting him so much he almost didn’t hear her request. With a sigh he then jumped down from her embrace and began leading her back to the dorms section of the base.

“You tired already? Well…To say the truth…I could use a nap…Alright, let’s go.”

As they walked slowly through the corridors, moving towards the dorms, Frenchfry couldn’t help but notice that Clover was starting to lag behind. Clearly moving the great bulk that her body had become was a great hassle for the agent, and Frenchfry didn’t like that she burned that much calories. For this reason he motioned her to sit at a nearby bench and, after giving her a quick pick-me-up in the form of a five liter pitcher of bulk up shake, he twirled away down in the corridors, searching for something to help her moving around.

Clover, sweating profusely, sat on the bench and began hastily gulping down from the huge pitcher he had left her, moaning in pleasure at the sweet taste of the shake.

‘Man, he’s such a good friend. He seems to have taken me quite fondly. Still, I’ve got a job to do and that I shall do. But his shakes are surely the best!’

Just as she was slurping down the last few drops of shake Clover saw that the little alien chef was returning at the wheel of a vehicle similar to a golf cart. Smiling, realizing that he had noted how tired she felt she stood slowly from the bench and, following his indications, she hooped in. Sitting down comfortably she felt in heaven.

As she tried to thank him, she found herself grabbing another of his healthy shakes with a complementary large energy bar still wrapped up in its cover. Partly confused, she placed the pitcher in her cleavage, so to be able to drink from it without using her hands and began inspecting the bar, as she swallowed mouthful after mouthful of the shake. She seemed to ignore the fact that she now had enough cleavage to be able to do just that, instead focusing all her attention to the huge bar in her hands. For some reason it seemed to be written in strange characters she didn’t recognize but, as she opened it, and tasted it, she found herself moaning louder than before at the excellent taste of it.

“This…*munch*…ish…amazing, Frenchfry! Where…*gulp*…did you…*munch*…found it?”

The little alien didn’t answer as he was still driving the cart but, with his second set of hands, began to pile near Clover a small mountain of those energy bars, letting the girl squeal in delight as she began to tore into them as if starving. Yet, her body was already stretching to almost her maximum and so, after quite a handful of those bars, she found herself breathing hard, as she tried to cram one more of those bars down her throat but without any space available in her hugely inflated paunch.

“*Urp!*…Oh man…these are...delicious…feel so….full and yet…so hungry…”


What Clover didn’t know was that the bars she was having were something that Frechfry had purchased once in space and rapidly made stockpiles of it. It was a special energy bar that not only was addictive as his own cuisine, but it was also just as much fattening. Knowing that could become bothersome to always have a large meal as a snack he had often used those bars to help his project grow larger, when they still weren’t that addicted to his own products.

In Clover’s case he didn’t want to raise her suspicion by offering her cakes of junk-food as they were traveling in the cart.

Soon, though, hey arrived at their destination and here, Frenchfry, had to help once more the overfed girl to climb down from the cart, assisting her then to move toward her own private room, where she could nap for a bit.

Helping her getting into bed, adjusting the rather large pajama he had prepared for her, he remained there a few minutes watching her as she fell asleep.

He huge bloated body sprawled on a double king-sized bed occupying almost half of it with her bulk. Her bloated gut, sticking out in the air while compressed in her tight fitting pajama top, still rock-hard from its fullness, jutting out a good foot and some in front of her. He hips and ass, also had grown wider, creating some kind of shelf behind her, something he planned to use in future to help her grow even more. Her legs, as wide as tree trunks, still laying as much apart as she could manage, even though she didn’t have to move, tightly encased in her pajama bottom appeared to his eyes more like sausages than much else. And then he saw her face, with a definite double chin growing under it, her cheeks getting fleshier and softer. He looked at her and smiled from a job well done.
Soon, he knew, she could become his masterpiece.

Yet there was plenty of time for her to grow into that role. And he was sure going to push her as much as he could toward it.


With a full night rest, Clover’s body began to absorb the calories she had ingested during the day, growing less bloated but much fatter. She then woke early in the morning, feeling something tug at her. She yawned widely and, feeling quite refreshed looked around. She remained laying on the bed, enjoying the comfort of it, until she felt again something tugging at her left sleeve. Turning her head that way she saw Frenchfry standing there, with his constant smile.

“Hey..Good morning...*yawn* Frenchfry…”

As he stayed there he simply twirled a bit and offered to her prone form on the bed a large shake made up with bulk up powder and a few more of the bars he had already given to her the day before. The blonde spy simply smiled as she saw the bounty her friend had brought to her and quickly began to mow them down. Making quick work of both the bars and the shake she, soon, found herself empty handed but, before che could utter a word Frenchfry was quick enough to provide her with more of both.

Soon Clover began to lose herself in the delicious taste of the shakes and the energy bars, yet she failed to notice how tight her pajama top was getting, the buttons on the front starting to creak lightly as it strained to keep her growing form compressed within it. More and more shake passed through her lips, along with those extra fattening bars and more tight her top began to be on her middle. Still Clover was lost herself in a gluttonous haze and could only continue gorging on the food provided by the little chef.

Still, after five or six gallons of gain shake ingested, along with almost a hundred and fifty bars consumed, her body reached the stress limit of the pajama top. with a loud ripping sound the top opened up showering the room she was in with all the buttons on the front, letting her globular huge gut fall freely forward. For a moment the girl seemed to recover her self but, as Frenchfry passed her another pitcher of gainshake all her resolve vanished and she let herself be fed again.

'Must have shrunk it in the washing machine. Well, I'll just see later on if I can find a spare around in the base...'

Seeing her gut explode free of its confinement made Frenchfry realize that the girl in front of him was something else than just a passing meal. SHe had the potential to become so much more.
Still, he had done what needed, and was time now to let her rest some more. The little alien chef still wanted her ready for her incoming breakfast... Or maybe could have been better to slow it down a notch?

In the end he opted for.....
12311212111142313.title: A snack and some rest

choices: Suddenly her cellphone buzz…someone’s calling! Who’s there?
123112121111423131.content:
When Clover woke up again she found it was still morning and, even though her huge pre-breakfast should have left her sated for quite a while her ludicrous tummy grumbled hungrily, asking to be filled witha new, fresh, batch of food.

"Mmm...Gotta have...breakfast...need my...energies for...the day...
"
As she said that she slowly rose from her bed and, although waddling more heavily than the day before she began following the little chef onto their cart-thingy.

“Ohh…You thought of everything didn’t you Frenchfry? Well, let’s go to have some breakfast. Then, I’ve got to check the base for any miscreants.
That is also part of my duties.”

The alien smiled wickedly at that promise. He for sure couldn’t have her waltzing around losing precious calories for something as useless as that. So he drove her toward the mess hall, while offering her large trays filled with donuts and more of his energy bars as a quick snack before real breakfast.

“Oh? Some goodies? Yummy!”

Clover tore through them as if she hadn’t eaten in days, her gluttonous side left free to take her anywhere her hunger took her. It took them some time to reach the canteen, as the car was having troubles managing the fattened-up spy, but they made it there. As soon as they arrived, Clover looked with a disappointed frown noticing the lack of anything edible at the table where Frenchfry had brought her. She began to voice her doubts when she saw that on the table there were some of his written cardboards.
Picking them up she began to read.

‘Hi! I saw how hard the mission is on you
Want to help you do your job best
Prepared special meal for you to try
Will give you lotsa energy for the day
When ready, just use hose with mouth.
Hope you enjoy it!
-Frenchfry’

As she stopped reading she was that the table wasn’t actually empty, as she had thought, but there was a strange looking hose on it with a written placard which said ‘try me’. Shrugging, Cover placed the hose in her mouth and waited for a bit, suddenly she felt the hose growing more stiffly and soon a deluge of her favorite shake began to pour down from the hose into her throat. Smiling she began to gulp it down as fast as she could, already feeling the liquid filling up her greedy belly. More time passed and yet she didn’t seem capable of letting that hose go. Even when her rumbling gut began to bloat out, letting more of her suit to rip at the seams, she didn’t mind. Clover was truly enjoying the taste and the bliss.

Still, after a couple of hours she felt the flow slowing down, until it trickled down to a stop. As she took the hose from her mout a huge, wet, belch escaped her lips and yet she felt good.

Whatever her friend had used for that shake had left her satisfied. But the little alien wanted more of her.

As she placed the hose back on the table, before she could try to lift herself off of it, the small alien twirled near her, leaving in front of her a large salad bowl full of sugary cereals and milk.

As in autopilot, Clover began eating at it in earnest, and yet she asked her friend what was going on.

“*Slurp*…Frenchfry…*gulp* what is…the meaning…of… this?”

As she continued to place spoonful after spoonful between her lips, Frenchfry left her a new card as he sped once more toward the kitchen, busily working behind the stoves to prepare more for her.

The girl, still eating away at what was easily three liters of milk with way too much sugary cereals, quickly red the message and smiled as comprehension arrived to her.


‘Shake through hose was only quick pick-me-up.
Breakfast is complete meal needed to full day.
Special Breakfast prepared for best friend/guard ever!
More coming soon.’

Slowly, she placed the spoon on the table and grabbed with both hands the salad bowl, placing the rim of it near her lips as she lifted it to swallow the last scraps on the bottom of it. Gulping it all down she began to place it down when she heard her friend twirl surrounding her and found herself without the bowl in her hands. Meanwhile the table was completely covered with trays of greasy foods which, she was sure of it, had to be the Special Breakfast he had been talking around.

Salivating heavily, she looked around and saw huge slabs of steaks, almost four inches of height, covered in fried eggs and melted cheese. Fried bacon strips encased in crunchy fried cheesy bites; hot dogs made with greasy pieces of fried chicken instead of the normal sausages. These were just a few examples of what Clover was facing and yet, despite being so obviously unhealthy and being portions so big that a normal person alone couldn’t manage one of the, Clover didn’t mind. The more she looked around the hungrier she felt.

Without a word she simply let herself go.

For hours she gorged through her meal, without any reaction, if not joy, for any new addition brought forward by her friend. With no reaction whatsoever to her ever-enlarging figure as more and more food went into her seemingly bottomless gut. Not when she couldn’t reach the table anymore, nor even when she was forced to dive headfirst into the meal since she was getting so bloated that no other mean was available.

Through all this Frenchfry kept providing and watching her balloon up.

He only wondered for how long he should keep providing to her like this…
123112121111423131.title: A really BIG breakfast

choices: Yes! I will need both Sam and Alex to help with an issue here!
Thanks, but could you send only Alex? I need her to assist with the VIP
Jerry, yeah, but send Sam for now. I need her analytical assistance here
No, Jerry. Everything is fine…I just kinda forgot to call…Sorry!
1231121211114231313.content:
Frechfry made sure to make these massive feast-like meals become an habit for the young spy, day after day, as her meals became more and more massive, so her figure exploded. Still, even though he usually filled her up with all that food, he still brought her around the base to fill up some more at some of the games in the country fair section. In fact, he had to admit she was getting kind of good in swallowing entire fried chickens at a time, at the Golden Chicken booth.

Clover was drunk on food.

She was eating so much of it everyday that she literally couldn’t say how much of it she was eating. And the fact that moving around was getting so hard on her didn’t impact at all on her situation. She kept making silly excuses to cover up her situation.
After a month of such a treatment it wasn’t a surprise for Frenchfry when he saw how big the blonde spy had grown. She had become a colossal mountain of jiggly fat. Her head had sunk in the sea of flabby chins that had one been her neck.

Her body had outgrown the normal human proportion long ago, becoming an almost inhuman blob like thing, which was still barely recognizable to mankind thanks to he huge, overflowing sacks of meat that had once been breasts.

Everything else had seemingly vanished under her apron like gut, mixed together as it was fat covering itself up to her swollen feet, buried under her literal tonnage of fatty tissue. She was now truly immobile, not even if she wanted to, she could more than bat her eyelashes or open and close her mouth. But in moving her lips she had become a champion. Even now, as she was currently between her fifth mid-afternoon snack and her first pre-dinner snack, she opened and closed her mouth like a champion, swallowing down whatever Frenchfry pushed toward her.

Clover ha never felt so free in her life, here she was working away in a mission from Woohp and, for once, nothing seemed wrong. Sure, she had lost count of the time passing and, maybe, she had let herself go a little in her workout/duties routine but, still she was performing her work nicely. Otherwise how could she feel so unburdened and carefree? And in all of that she had to thank only her friend Frenchfry who was helping her at her every step with delicious meals, prepared exactly to her and for her needs.

It was true that she was having some issues lately, she was almost always tired and sweaty, and for some reason she was having trouble in seeing her feet but, it wasn’t anything major, she was sure of it.

It couldn’t be, after all she still did a lot of exercise each day and that was why he was sweaty and tired.

In Clover’s mind that was an inescapable logic.

One that had to be true. Her mind had grown so used to her lies that these same lies were now truth. Even in those rare moments when she seemed to realize how wrong she was, quickly her mind covered everything up to apply the ‘new normal’ rule. And so, she continued down the path of gluttonous hedonism. Completely unaware of how she was really living.

She wasn’t mobile anymore? She was just tired.

She ate a truckload of sweets? That was just the occasional splurge.

She ate throughout a full 24-hour meal laden feast? It was just a little snack.

No matter how big her white lies were getting, she still believed in them.

To say the truth, that wasn’t only her fault, it was also a side effect from Frenchfry food. But the alien chef didn’t dare say it out loud. He was still enjoying Clover growth and all of his thoughts about eating her had changed in seeing her grow. She had become more than a meal.

She had quickly become his pet and so he had to be sure she was well fed.

For that reason, he made all he could to keep her cheerful, and full, all the time. Trying to satisfy her every whim and desire, long before she even asked for them. Frenchfry was just so happy about her that he couldn’t stop.
Yet, Clover, under this deluge of treats and endless meals, was vastly outgrowing everything around her. Even as Frenchfry pushed between her lips his next batch of cakes, a full dozen of them, she did a quick work of them and opened her mouth again waiting for more, as he body fat began to push more and more forcefully against the crumbling wall of the room she was in. Experiment 062 knew that, at this rate, she was going to outgrow the room and, possibly, the base if he let her keep growing…but h simply couldn’t stop.

Still, as she had just cleared out the last of her afternoon snacks, belching loudly with a sound that echoed down the base, leaving her body to tremble and jiggle for a long minute, something happened that threatened all the situation to collapse.

Her phone, amidst so many layers of fat began to buzz, vibrating through her many layers of fat as the little chef dived into her fat to retrieve it, to place it against her ear letting her answer to the call.

“Hi…*urp*…Clover’s here.”

“Hello Clover, it’s me Jerry. We were getting worried since you weren’t answering the phone and so we wanted to know if you were alright. I’m ready to send you some reinforcements if you think you’re in need of them to continue the mission…”

Clover looked to Frenchfry for a moment before answering back to her boss, as if waiting for him to decide what to do. The alien chef looked at her and then quickly scribbled something on one of his cardboard notes saying…
1231121211114231313.title: A month full of fattening delicacies…

choices: Show her the games and/or the recreational around
Start a massive lunch for her and keep her pinned there
Try to inquire more on her tastes, provide personalized menus
More shakes! Have that butt grow!
12311212111142313131.content:
Clover wasn’t sure if she wanted to ask to her friends to come with her but, once she checked with her chef friend if there were any issues from his side, she smiled as she replied in the phone.

“Hi Jerry! Well, this base while secure is pretty big and so I don’t think I’ll be able to cover all the perimeter by myself. If you could send Alex and Sam over would be good. Still…” here she stopped as she saw Frenchfry approaching her with some of his cards, resuming as she read them over to Jerry.

“…Still, since I’ve to guard the VIP, could you send first Alex and then, after a week or so also Sam? So I can show them one at a time what to do, while still keeping guard of him?”

For a moment there was silence from the other side of the line and, just when Clover was about to ask, Jerry answered back.

“Well, that is uncommon. Still, you’re the agent on field and I trust your decision. Alright, I’ll send Alex over in a couple of hours then, in a week – ten days’ time also Sam will join you there. Remember Clover, if you ever need any assistance don’t hesitate to contact me.
Bye”

“Bye Jerry…and thanks again!”

As Clover motioned her friend to hung up the phone call, she quizzically looked at him, before he began once more to shovel more and more food in her mouth. As she chewed and swallowed, she managed to slowly ask her question to the little blue alien.

“So…why…did…*munch*…you…ask…for…the…*gulp*…girls…to arrive…*urp*…. separately…?”

Frenchfry, without stopping filling her with all the food he could manage, began to prepare some more of his cards, so to explain her what his idea had been.

As the blonde agent continued accepting anything edible the little chef provided her she began reading his cards, signaling him to turn page with a nod of her head. She had no other way to communicate since her mouth was busy eating, chewing and swallowing up wagon’s worth of food and the rest of her body was as big as a small mountain, and just as mobile.

‘I ask for them to come one by one
To be safer in showing meself to them
Letting them grow accustomed to my presence’

Clover had to admit that was a clever idea. She didn’t know for which reason her friends shouldn’t have trusted Frenchfry, but it was better this way. Still, as she kept eating, a small slice of fear and doubt began to creep in her mind as she tried to look at herself. Clover, even though was far too gluttonous to stop eating, still was beginning to fear that her friends would laugh of the one or two pounds she had gained while staying for a month in that base. In truth, with the fear of her friends coming her mind had to accept the fact that she had gained weight, but still it made up lies on the amount.

For this reason, as Frenchfry stopped shoveling food down her throat feeling she had just reached her fullness point, Clover groggily tried to call hi to her. The alien chef, noticing that her pet was more asleep than awake moved closer, trying to figure out what she wanted before she fell asleep.

“*Yawn*…Frenchfry…before my friends…come… I’ve got a…favor to…ask of you. Could you…delay them from… meeting with me for a …couple of days… I need to…slim…up a bit…first”

Cover had barely managed to ask her favor before all the tons of food she had consumed took their toll on her, forcing her to fall asleep quite rapidly, as her hugely body began to digest everything she had eaten, turning it into even more fat. Frenchfry, as he heard that request didn’t had to think on it twice.

That was just what he needed, with the fattened-up girl out of the picture, he could simply show the delights of his cuisine to the new girls arriving. The little alien could hardly wait.


Later that same day, as Clover was resting in her own room, where Frenchfry had slowly moved her to keep her out of view, he heard the sound of a rocket capsule arriving in the base and quickly moved toward the hangar to welcome the new girl. As he went there, he prepared a few more signs to explain why clover wasn’t going to be there with him.

As the rocket capsule landed in HVN Base, Alex emerged from it feeling a bit dizzy. The trip, as always, had been a bit too fast for her taste and now she wasn’t feeling too good. Still, Jerry had warned her that Clover had requested her assistance before the one of Sam and that, unconsciously, had been a great boost of confidence for Alex. Still, as she scanned the area, she noticed the lack of her friend but saw an approaching strange little being. It was a fairly small creature, with a blue-ish skin and a chef hat protuberance coming out of his head.

“And what are you, exactly?”

Frenchfry simply smiled and shwed the new girl the signs he had prepared.

‘Hi! My name’s Frenchfry. I’m the VIP you’re here to protect.
Clover is currently roaming the base in search of any intruder.
She has asked me to help you prepare.
Please, follow me.’

As he made to turn and show Alex the way toward the canteen he suddenly whirled and offered her a quite thick milkshake, asking implicitly her to have a taste. The girl, unsure about the situation gave to the little alien a creeped out smile and took a quick sip of the shake.

Immediately her eyes bulged out of their sockets. Her mouth was assaulted by the most delicious shake she had ever had. Suddenly she began gulping it down faster and faster, quickly emptying it out, leaving her with an unsatisfied expression. Luckily for her, another shake seemed to appear out of thin air, brought to herby the whirly blue alien, and she quickly rejoiced in the heavenly taste.

What Alex didn’t seem to notice was the effects that those milkshakes were having on her body. As she kept drinking, following Frenchfry through a maze of corridors, she failed to realize that her backside was seemingly growing out larger. Sure, it was a very slow process but still, it kept constantly growing as more and more shake made its way into her stomach. What should have surprised her, if she had been aware of it, was that she was already on her sixth shake and yet she didn’t seem to be having enough of it yet.

Frenchfry, instead, had noticed the little growth very well and so he began speeding up through the hallways until he reached the large mess hall were, he was going to have this new girl growing into her new form. A fattened one.

His only issue was on the how he was going to do it. He could convince her to try, right away, some of the recreational facilities in the base or he could just force on her enough food to grow out of her, already getting tighter, uniform. He had also the time against him, since there was only a week before the new girl was going to arrive. In that time, he had to fatten up Alex and have her convinced that everything was alright.

So much to do and so little time…

12433352211.title: Stick with Kamala

124333522111.content:
Kamala was watching TV in her bedroom when she heard the tower's alarms going off. Knowing none of the other Avengers were present, she deduced it had to be someone trying to invade.

After getting information of the individual's current location from F.R.I.D.A.Y., Kamala raced to the first floor of the tower. There, she noticed a small creature. He was light grey, had what seemed to be a chief's hat on his head, a red nose, a small black moustache, four arms and a spatula-like tail. Upon noticing her, he smiled, pulled her in and held up a large pepperoni pizza for her.
