Kevin McAllister is a young boy, who has been left all by himself. This may be due to the fact that his family had to leave quickly, unaware that their youngest is left behind. Regardless though, Kevin doesn’t seem to care and simply enjoyed his time being alone in the house.

He can be seen sitting on the couch, watching TV for a while, when his stomach was beginning to growl so heavily, he can smell some food coming from the kitchen, as if to say someone is cooking in his place.

“Boy, I’m getting hungr... Say, who’s in the kitchen? I thought I was home alone!” Kevin was left in confusion since he started to realised there’s seemed to be some intruder in the house.

The youngster wasted no time but to go over and see it for himself, and that’s when he saw a creature that certainly doesn’t look like he came from Earth. His name is Frenchfry, and he’s just recently transported from another part of the world, where he successfully fattened up Lilo and Stitch.

Kevin couldn’t believe his eyes, even more so when he saw the creature cooking in his own. From his point of view, he may have some questions to ask, as to where did that came from, and why cooking in the kitchen? That’s when his mind turned off, when he was then greeted by Frenchfry and smiled by giving him the plate of hamburgers to start things off.

“Bon Appétit!” Frenchfry says with a wicked smile.

“Oh.. err.. thank!” Kevin was a little bit speechless, when he receives some hamburgers from Frenchfry.

Of course he was hungry to begin with, so he shrugged and eats up the burger straight away. He had another bite after that, and so much so that it caused Kevin to express his satisfactory sound, just as he swallowed another one of these burgers. Frenchfry said, "Of course you can have more, you poor little thing. Just come with me and I'll take care of you!" in his French accent and Alex eagerly came along. Ordinarily, Alex would probably be much more skeptical. He remembered learning something about not talking to strangers in school, but he had long since abandoned that rule. After all, his parents weren't strangers, and they clearly didn't care about him at all. He might have been worried about any potential danger, but as far as he was concerned, anything was better than starving in the streets.

Frenchfry and Alex walked through some back allies for quite a while, getting to a nicer part of the city. It was the middle of the night, so when they walked through the front doors of a fancy hotel, no one was in the lobby. In fact, the receptionist was in the back taking care of some paperwork. Frenchfry slunk behind the counter, grabbing the set of keys to one of the rooms without a sound, then he brought Alex with him as they snuck to the stairs, going up to the third floor where the room was. They got through the room and were in the clear.

Alex would've thought stealing was wrong if he hadn't been scraping by on the streets to survive. Instead, he was impressed by Frenchfry's skill, and wanted to be able to sneak around just like him! Either way, now that they were settled down, Frenchfry thought of what his next move was to prepare his meal. He had a lot of work to do given that Alex was so skinny and dirty, and yet he had so much potential. For now, Frenchfry...

1453333222333333131.content:
Tom was your typical jock. He was an even six feet tall with medium length, wavy, dirty blonde hair, blue eyes, and lightly tanned skin with a clean-shaven handsome face. He wasn't very smart, but he didn't have to be. His accomplishments as a quarterback in high school got him into a great college and got him the quarterback spot on the school's team as a freshman, taking over for the graduating senior quarterback and being chosen over quite a few second-stringers. He loved the game, and he was really good at it, but now that he had settled into his first few weeks with the team, something became incredibly clear: college football players, especially lineman, were much bigger than high school players. Even with lineman of his own, Tom didn't stand a chance whenever he was vulnerable or needed to run. He was quite lanky for a football player, and it was getting to the point where he had to change something to keep up.

That's how he got to where he was right now. His main focus above the degree that he didn't plan on using anyway was bulking up so he could play better. He figured that if he ate a lot more protein and worked out a lot, with luck, he'd get bigger and stronger. He wanted to focus on his arms, as he was a quarterback, but he figured he could use more muscle mass all around.

Today is the first day of Tom's bulking regimen. He was awake early to get a workout in before the gym got busy. He was heading back to his dorm after making a protein shake in the kitchen, and much to his surprise, he saw a little gray alien with a mustache named Frenchfry. Tom nearly dropped his shake, and he was speechless, with his jaw dropped before he said, "Wait, are you an alien?". Frenchfry merely nodded before he gestured to a stack of steaks he made, which were sitting on a platter on Tom's desk, saying "Bon appetite!" and Tom said, "Wait, are those for me?" and Frenchfry nodded. Tom saw how perfectly cooked the steaks were, and the smell was quite intoxicating. Tom finished his shake and said, "Well I guess steaks have a lot of protein!" and he sat down on his chair, grabbing the fork that was there and cutting through the stack of steaks like they were pancakes.

The steaks were perfectly tender, so they were easy to cut through. Tom took his first absurdly large bite of steak, moaning a bit at how good it was. He chewed it down and eagerly took the next bite, continuing to plow through the steaks until they were history. He was now decently chubby, and soon after finishing the steaks...
1453333222333333131.title: Tom's encounter
